   21: %%
   22: -module(mnesia_evil_coverage_test).
   23: -author('hakan@erix.ericsson.se').
   24: -include("mnesia_test_lib.hrl").
   25: 
   26: -export([init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2,
   27:          init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,
   28:          all/0, groups/0]).
   29: 
   30: -export([system_info/1, table_info/1, error_description/1,
   31:          db_node_lifecycle/1, evil_delete_db_node/1, start_and_stop/1,
   32:          checkpoint/1, checkpoint_del_table/1, table_lifecycle/1, storage_options/1,
   33:          add_copy_conflict/1, add_copy_when_going_down/1, add_copy_when_dst_going_down/1,
   34:          add_copy_with_down/1,
   35:          replica_management/1, clear_table_during_load/1,
   36:          schema_availability/1, local_content/1,
   37:          replica_location/1, user_properties/1, unsupp_user_props/1,
   38:          sorted_ets/1, index_cleanup/1,
   39:          change_table_access_mode/1, change_table_load_order/1,
   40:          set_master_nodes/1, offline_set_master_nodes/1,
   41:          dump_tables/1, dump_log/1, wait_for_tables/1, force_load_table/1,
   42:          snmp_open_table/1, snmp_close_table/1, snmp_get_next_index/1,
   43:          snmp_get_row/1, snmp_get_mnesia_key/1, snmp_update_counter/1,
   44:          snmp_order/1, subscribe_standard/1, subscribe_extended/1,
   45:          foldl/1, info/1, schema_0/1, schema_1/1, view_0/1, view_1/1, view_2/1,
   46:          lkill/1, kill/1,
   47:          record_name_dirty_access_ram/1,
   48:          record_name_dirty_access_disc/1,
   49:          record_name_dirty_access_disc_only/1,
   50:          record_name_dirty_access_xets/1]).
   51: 
   52: -export([info_check/8, index_size/1]).
   53: 
   54: -define(cleanup(N, Config),
   55: 	mnesia_test_lib:prepare_test_case([{reload_appls, [mnesia]}],
   56: 					  N, Config, ?FILE, ?LINE)).
   57: init_per_testcase(Func, Conf) ->
   58:     mnesia_test_lib:init_per_testcase(Func, Conf).
   59: 
   60: end_per_testcase(Func, Conf) ->
   61:     mnesia_test_lib:end_per_testcase(Func, Conf).
   62: 
   63: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   64: all() -> 
   65:     [system_info, table_info, error_description,
   66:      db_node_lifecycle, evil_delete_db_node, start_and_stop,
   67:      checkpoint, checkpoint_del_table,
   68:      table_lifecycle, storage_options,
   69:      add_copy_conflict,
   70:      add_copy_when_going_down, add_copy_when_dst_going_down, add_copy_with_down,
   71:      replica_management,
   72:      clear_table_during_load,
   73:      schema_availability, local_content,
   74:      {group, table_access_modifications}, replica_location,
   75:      {group, table_sync}, user_properties, unsupp_user_props,
   76:      {group, record_name}, {group, snmp_access},
   77:      {group, subscriptions}, {group, iteration},
   78:      {group, debug_support}, sorted_ets, index_cleanup,
   79:      {mnesia_dirty_access_test, all},
   80:      {mnesia_trans_access_test, all},
   81:      {mnesia_evil_backup, all}].
   82: 
   83: groups() -> 
   84:     [{table_access_modifications, [],
   85:       [change_table_access_mode, change_table_load_order,
   86:        set_master_nodes, offline_set_master_nodes]},
   87:      {table_sync, [],
   88:       [dump_tables, dump_log, wait_for_tables,
   89:        force_load_table]},
   90:      {snmp_access, [],
   91:       [snmp_open_table, snmp_close_table, snmp_get_next_index,
   92:        snmp_get_row, snmp_get_mnesia_key, snmp_update_counter,
   93:        snmp_order]},
   94:      {subscriptions, [],
   95:       [subscribe_standard, subscribe_extended]},
   96:      {iteration, [], [foldl]},
   97:      {debug_support, [],
   98:       [info, schema_0, schema_1, view_0, view_1, view_2,
   99:        lkill, kill]},
  100:      {record_name, [], [{group, record_name_dirty_access}]},
  101:      {record_name_dirty_access, [],
  102:       [record_name_dirty_access_ram,
  103:        record_name_dirty_access_disc,
  104:        record_name_dirty_access_disc_only,
  105:        record_name_dirty_access_xets
  106:       ]}].
  107: 
  108: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  109:     Config.
  110: 
  111: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  112:     Config.
  113: 
  114: 
  115: 
  116: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  117: %% Get meta info about Mnesia
  118: 
  119: system_info(suite) -> [];
  120: system_info(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  121:     Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(all, Config),
  122:     Ns = ?sort(Nodes),
  123:     ?match(yes, mnesia:system_info(is_running)),
  124:     ?match(Ns, ?sort(mnesia:system_info(db_nodes))),
  125:     ?match(Ns, ?sort(mnesia:system_info(running_db_nodes))),
  126:     ?match(A when is_atom(A), mnesia:system_info(debug)),
  127:     ?match(L when is_list(L), mnesia:system_info(directory)),
  128:     ?match(L when is_list(L), mnesia:system_info(log_version)),
  129:     ?match({_, _}, mnesia:system_info(schema_version)),
  130:     ?match(L when is_list(L), mnesia:system_info(tables)),
  131:     ?match(L when is_list(L), mnesia:system_info(local_tables)),
  132:     ?match(L when is_list(L), mnesia:system_info(held_locks)),
  133:     ?match(L when is_list(L), mnesia:system_info(lock_queue)),
  134:     ?match(L when is_list(L), mnesia:system_info(transactions)),
  135:     ?match(I when is_integer(I), mnesia:system_info(transaction_failures)),
  136:     ?match(I when is_integer(I), mnesia:system_info(transaction_commits)),
  137:     ?match(I when is_integer(I), mnesia:system_info(transaction_restarts)),
  138:     ?match(L when is_list(L), mnesia:system_info(checkpoints)),
  139:     ?match(A when is_atom(A), mnesia:system_info(backup_module)),
  140:     ?match(true, mnesia:system_info(auto_repair)),
  141:     ?match({_, _}, mnesia:system_info(dump_log_interval)),
  142:     ?match(A when is_atom(A), mnesia:system_info(dump_log_update_in_place)),
  143:     ?match(I when is_integer(I), mnesia:system_info(transaction_log_writes)),
  144:     ?match(I when is_integer(I), mnesia:system_info(send_compressed)),
  145:     ?match(I when is_integer(I), mnesia:system_info(max_transfer_size)),
  146:     ?match(L when is_list(L), mnesia:system_info(all)),
  147:     ?match(L when is_list(L), mnesia:system_info(backend_types)),
  148:     ?match({'EXIT', {aborted, Reason }} when element(1, Reason) == badarg
  149:            , mnesia:system_info(ali_baba)),
  150:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  151: 
  152: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  153: %% Get meta info about table
  154: 
  155: table_info(suite) -> [];
  156: table_info(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  157:     [Node1, Node2, Node3] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
  158:     
  159:     Tab  = table_info,
  160:     Type = bag,
  161:     ValPos = 3,
  162:     Attrs = [k, v],
  163:     Arity = length(Attrs) +1,
  164: 
  165:     Schema = 
  166: 	case mnesia_test_lib:diskless(Config) of
  167: 	    true -> [{type, Type}, {attributes, Attrs}, {index, [ValPos]},
  168: 		     {ram_copies, [Node1, Node2]}, {ext_ram_copies, [Node3]}];
  169: 	    false ->		
  170: 		[{type, Type}, {attributes, Attrs}, {index, [ValPos]},
  171: 		 {disc_only_copies, [Node1]}, {ram_copies, [Node2]},
  172: 		 {ext_ram_copies, [Node3]}]
  173: 	end,
  174:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, Schema)),
  175: 
  176:     Size = 10,
  177:     Keys = lists:seq(1, Size),
  178:     Records = [{Tab, A, 7} || A <- Keys],
  179:     lists:foreach(fun(Rec) -> ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(Rec)) end, Records),
  180: 
  181:     case mnesia_test_lib:diskless(Config) of
  182: 	true -> 
  183: 	    ?match(Nodes, mnesia:table_info(Tab, ram_copies));
  184: 	false ->              
  185: 	    ?match([Node3], mnesia:table_info(Tab, ext_ram_copies)),
  186: 	    ?match([Node2], mnesia:table_info(Tab, ram_copies)),
  187: 	    ?match([Node1], mnesia:table_info(Tab, mnesia_test_lib:storage_type(disc_only_copies, Config)))
  188:     end,
  189:     Read = [Node1, Node2, Node3],
  190:     Write = ?sort([Node1, Node2, Node3]),
  191: 
  192:     {[ok,ok,ok], []} = rpc:multicall(Nodes, ?MODULE, info_check,
  193: 				     [Tab, Read, Write, Size, Type, ValPos, Arity, Attrs]),
  194: 
  195:     ?match({atomic, Attrs}, mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:table_info(Tab, attributes) end)),
  196: 
  197:     ?match(L when is_list(L), mnesia:table_info(Tab, all)),
  198: 
  199:     %% Table info when table not loaded
  200:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  201: 	   mnesia:create_table(tab_info, Schema)),
  202:     ?match(stopped, mnesia:stop()),
  203:     ?match(stopped, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, stop, [])),
  204:     ?match(ok, mnesia:start()),
  205:     ?match(ok, mnesia:wait_for_tables([tab_info], 5000)),
  206:     ?match(0, mnesia:table_info(tab_info, size)),
  207:     ?verify_mnesia([Node1, Node3], [Node2]).
  208: 
  209: info_check(Tab, Read, Write, Size, Type, ValPos, Arity, Attrs) ->
  210:     ?match(true, lists:member(mnesia:table_info(Tab, where_to_read), Read)),
  211:     ?match(Write, ?sort(mnesia:table_info(Tab, where_to_write))),
  212:     ?match(Mem when is_integer(Mem), mnesia:table_info(Tab, memory)),
  213:     ?match(Size, mnesia:table_info(Tab, size)),
  214:     ?match(Type, mnesia:table_info(Tab, type)),
  215:     ?match([ValPos], mnesia:table_info(Tab, index)),
  216:     ?match(Arity, mnesia:table_info(Tab, arity)),
  217:     ?match(Attrs, mnesia:table_info(Tab, attributes)),
  218:     ?match({Tab, '_', '_'}, mnesia:table_info(Tab, wild_pattern)),
  219:     ok.
  220: 
  221: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  222: %% Check the error descriptions
  223: 
  224: error_description(suite) -> [];
  225: error_description(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  226:     ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
  227:     Errors = [nested_transaction, badarg, no_transaction, combine_error,
  228:               bad_index, already_exists, index_exists, no_exists, system_limit,
  229:               mnesia_down, not_a_db_node, bad_type, node_not_running, 
  230:               truncated_binary_file, active, illegal
  231:              ],
  232:     ?match(X when is_atom(X), mnesia:error_description({error, bad_error_msg})),
  233:     ?match(X when is_tuple(X), mnesia:error_description({'EXIT', pid, bad})),
  234:     %% This is real error msg
  235:     ?match(X when is_tuple(X), mnesia:error_description(
  236:                               {error, 
  237:                                {"Cannot prepare checkpoint (bad reply)",
  238:                                 {{877,957351,758147},a@legolas},
  239:                                 {error,{node_not_running,a1@legolas}}}})),
  240:     check_errors(error, Errors),
  241:     check_errors(aborted, Errors),
  242:     check_errors('EXIT', Errors).
  243: 
  244: check_errors(_Err, []) -> ok;
  245: check_errors(Err, [Desc|R]) -> 
  246:     ?match(X when is_list(X), mnesia:error_description({Err, Desc})),
  247:     check_errors(Err, R).
  248: 
  249: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  250: %% Add and drop db nodes
  251: 
  252: db_node_lifecycle(suite) -> [];
  253: db_node_lifecycle(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  254:     [Node1, Node2, Node3] = AllNodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
  255:     Tab = db_node_lifecycle,
  256: 
  257:     Who = fun(T) ->
  258: 		  L1 = mnesia:table_info(T, ram_copies),
  259: 		  L2 = mnesia:table_info(T, disc_copies),
  260: 		  L3 = mnesia:table_info(T, disc_only_copies),
  261: 		  L4 = mnesia:table_info(T, ext_ram_copies),
  262: 		  L1 ++ L2 ++ L3 ++ L4
  263: 	  end,
  264: 
  265:     SNs = ?sort(AllNodes),
  266: 
  267:     Schema = [{name, Tab}, {ram_copies, [Node1, Node2]}],
  268:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Schema)),
  269: 
  270:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia(AllNodes)),
  271:     ?match(ok, mnesia:delete_schema(AllNodes)),
  272:     ?match({error, _}, mnesia:create_schema(foo)),
  273:     ?match({error, _}, mnesia:create_schema([foo])),
  274:     ?match({error, _}, mnesia:create_schema([foo@bar])),
  275:     ?match(ok, mnesia:start()),
  276:     ?match(false, mnesia:system_info(use_dir)),
  277:     ?match([ram_copies, disc_copies, disc_only_copies], mnesia:system_info(backend_types)),
  278:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, [])),
  279:     ?match({aborted, {has_no_disc, Node1}}, mnesia:dump_tables([Tab])),
  280:     ?match({aborted, {has_no_disc, Node1}}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, node(), disc_copies)),
  281:     ?match({aborted, {has_no_disc, Node1}}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, node(), disc_only_copies)),
  282: 
  283:     ?match(stopped, mnesia:stop()),
  284: 
  285:     ?match(ok, mnesia:create_schema(AllNodes, ?BACKEND)),
  286:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia(AllNodes)),
  287: 
  288:     ?match([SNs, SNs, SNs], 
  289: 	   lists:map(fun lists:sort/1,
  290: 		     element(1, rpc:multicall(AllNodes, mnesia, table_info, 
  291: 					      [schema, disc_copies])))),
  292: 
  293:     ?match({aborted, {already_exists, schema, Node2, _}},
  294:            mnesia:change_table_copy_type(schema, Node2, disc_copies)),
  295:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  296:            mnesia:change_table_copy_type(schema, Node2, ram_copies)),
  297:     ?match({aborted, {already_exists, schema, Node2, _}},
  298:            mnesia:change_table_copy_type(schema, Node2, ram_copies)),
  299:     
  300:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  301:            mnesia:change_table_copy_type(schema, Node2, disc_copies)),
  302: 
  303:     ?match([SNs, SNs, SNs], 
  304: 	   lists:map(fun lists:sort/1,
  305: 		     element(1, rpc:multicall(AllNodes, mnesia, table_info, 
  306: 					      [schema, disc_copies])))),
  307: 
  308:     %% Delete the DB 
  309: 
  310:     Tab2 = disk_tab,
  311:     Tab3 = not_local,
  312:     Tab4 = local,
  313:     Tab5 = remote,
  314:     Tab6 = ext1,
  315: 
  316:     Tabs = [Schema,
  317: 	    [{name, Tab2},  {disc_copies, AllNodes}],
  318: 	    [{name, Tab3},  {ram_copies, [Node2, Node3]}],
  319: 	    [{name, Tab4},  {disc_only_copies, [Node1]}],
  320: 	    [{name, Tab5},  {disc_only_copies, [Node2]}],
  321: 	    [{name, Tab6},  {ext_ram_copies, [Node1, Node2]}]
  322: 	   ],
  323: 
  324:     [?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(T)) || T <- Tabs ],
  325: 
  326:     ?match({aborted, {active, _, Node2}}, 
  327: 	   mnesia:del_table_copy(schema, Node2)),
  328: 
  329:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([Node1])),
  330:     ?match({aborted, {node_not_running, Node1}}, 
  331: 	   mnesia:del_table_copy(schema, Node2)),
  332: 
  333:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([Node1],[Tab2,Tab4,Tab6])),
  334:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([Node2])),
  335:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:del_table_copy(schema, Node2)),
  336: 
  337:     %% Check
  338:     RemNodes = AllNodes -- [Node2],
  339: 
  340:     ?match(RemNodes, mnesia:system_info(db_nodes)),
  341:     ?match([Node1], Who(Tab)),
  342:     ?match(RemNodes, Who(Tab2)),
  343:     ?match([Node3], Who(Tab3)),
  344:     ?match([Node1], Who(Tab4)),
  345:     ?match({'EXIT', {aborted, {no_exists, _, _}}}, Who(Tab5)),
  346:     ?match([Node1], Who(Tab6)),
  347: 
  348:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab2, Node3, ram_copies)),
  349: 
  350:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(schema, Node3, ram_copies)),
  351: 
  352:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([Node3])),
  353:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:del_table_copy(schema, Node3)),
  354:     ?match([Node1], mnesia:system_info(db_nodes)),
  355:     ?match([Node1], Who(Tab)),
  356:     ?match([Node1], Who(Tab2)),
  357:     ?match({'EXIT', {aborted, {no_exists, _, _}}}, Who(Tab3)),
  358:     ?match([Node1], Who(Tab4)),
  359:     ?match({'EXIT', {aborted, {no_exists, _, _}}}, Who(Tab5)),
  360: 
  361:     ?verify_mnesia([Node1], []).
  362: 
  363: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  364: %% Drop a db node when several disk resident nodes are down
  365: 
  366: evil_delete_db_node(suite) -> [];
  367: evil_delete_db_node(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  368:     [Node1, Node2, Node3] = AllNodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
  369:     Tab = evil_delete_db_node,
  370: 
  371:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, [{disc_copies, AllNodes}])),
  372:     
  373:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([Node2, Node3])),
  374: 
  375:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:del_table_copy(schema, Node2)),
  376:     
  377:     RemNodes = AllNodes -- [Node2],
  378:     
  379:     ?match(RemNodes, mnesia:system_info(db_nodes)),
  380:     ?match(RemNodes, mnesia:table_info(Tab, disc_copies)),
  381:     
  382:     ?verify_mnesia([Node1], []).
  383: 
  384: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  385: %% Start and stop the system
  386: 
  387: start_and_stop(suite) -> [];
  388: start_and_stop(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  389:     [Node1 | _] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(all, Config),
  390: 
  391:     ?match(stopped, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, stop, [])),
  392:     ?match(stopped, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, stop, [])),
  393:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, start, [])),
  394:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, start, [])),
  395:     ?match(stopped, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, stop, [])),
  396:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes -- [Node1], [Node1]),
  397:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia(Nodes)),
  398:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  399: 
  400: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  401: %% Checkpoints and backup management
  402: 
  403: checkpoint(suite) -> [];
  404: checkpoint(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  405:     checkpoint(2, Config),
  406:     checkpoint(3, Config),
  407:     ok.
  408: 
  409: checkpoint(NodeConfig, Config) ->
  410:     [Node1 | _] = TabNodes = ?acquire_nodes(NodeConfig, Config),
  411:     CreateTab = fun(Type, N, Ns) ->
  412:                         Tab0 = lists:concat(["local_checkpoint_", Type, N]),
  413:                         Tab = list_to_atom(Tab0),
  414:                         catch mnesia:delete_table(Tab),
  415:                         ?match({atomic, ok},
  416:                                mnesia:create_table(Tab, [{Type, Ns}])),
  417:                         Tab
  418:                 end,
  419:     CreateTabs = fun(Type, Acc) ->
  420:                          [CreateTab(Type, 1, [hd(TabNodes)]),
  421:                           CreateTab(Type, 2, TabNodes),
  422:                           CreateTab(Type, 3, [lists:last(TabNodes)])] ++
  423:                              Acc
  424:                  end,
  425:     Types = [ram_copies, disc_copies, disc_only_copies, ext_ram_copies],
  426:     Tabs = lists:foldl(CreateTabs, [], Types),
  427:     Recs = ?sort([{T, N, N} || T <- Tabs, N <- lists:seq(1, 10)]),
  428:     lists:foreach(fun(R) -> ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(R)) end, Recs),
  429: 
  430:     CpName = a_checkpoint_name,
  431:     MinArgs = [{name, CpName}, {min, Tabs}, {allow_remote, false}],
  432:     ?match({error, _}, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, activate_checkpoint, [MinArgs])),
  433: 
  434:     MaxArgs = [{name, CpName}, {max, Tabs}, {allow_remote, true}],
  435:     ?match({ok, CpName, L} when is_list(L),
  436: 	   rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, activate_checkpoint, [MaxArgs])),
  437:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, deactivate_checkpoint, [CpName])),
  438: 
  439:     Args = [{name, CpName}, {min, Tabs}, {allow_remote, true}],
  440:     ?match({ok, CpName, L} when is_list(L),
  441:            rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, activate_checkpoint, [Args])),
  442:     Recs2 = ?sort([{T, K, 0} || {T, K, _} <- Recs]),
  443:     lists:foreach(fun(R) -> ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(R)) end, Recs2),
  444:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, deactivate_checkpoint, [CpName])),
  445: 
  446:     ?match({error, Reason1 } when element(1, Reason1) == no_exists,
  447:            mnesia:deactivate_checkpoint(CpName)),
  448:     ?match({error, Reason2 } when element(1, Reason2) == badarg,
  449:            mnesia:activate_checkpoint(foo)),
  450:     ?match({error, Reason3 } when element(1, Reason3) == badarg,
  451:            mnesia:activate_checkpoint([{foo, foo}])),
  452:     ?match({error, Reason4 } when element(1, Reason4) == badarg,
  453:            mnesia:activate_checkpoint([{max, foo}])),
  454:     ?match({error, Reason5 } when element(1, Reason5) == badarg,
  455:            mnesia:activate_checkpoint([{min, foo}])),
  456:     ?match({error, _}, mnesia:activate_checkpoint([{min, [foo@bar]}])),
  457:     ?match({error, Reason6 } when element(1, Reason6) == badarg,
  458:            mnesia:activate_checkpoint([{allow_remote, foo}])),
  459: 
  460:     Fun = fun(Tab) -> ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:delete_table(Tab)) end,
  461:     lists:foreach(Fun, Tabs),
  462:     ?verify_mnesia(TabNodes, []).
  463: 
  464: 
  465: checkpoint_del_table(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  466:     [Node1] = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
  467:     [mnesia:create_table(list_to_atom("a_" ++ integer_to_list(I)), []) || I <- lists:seq(1, 1000)],
  468: 
  469:     Tabs = mnesia:system_info(local_tables),
  470: 
  471:     spawn(fun() ->
  472:                   mnesia:activate_checkpoint([{max, Tabs},{ram_overrides_dump, true}])
  473:           end),
  474: 
  475:     {atomic, ok} = mnesia:delete_table(a_10),
  476:     %% Ensure we didn't crash
  477: 
  478:     ?verify_mnesia([Node1], []).
  479: 
  480: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  481: %% Create and delete tables
  482: 
  483: %% Get meta info about table
  484: 
  485: -define(vrl, mnesia_test_lib:verify_replica_location).
  486: 
  487: replica_location(suite) -> [];
  488: replica_location(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  489:     [Node1, Node2, Node3] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
  490: 
  491:     %% Create three replicas
  492:     Check = fun(Tab, Schema) ->
  493: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table([{name, Tab}|Schema])),
  494: 		    ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [Node1], [Node2], [Node3], Nodes)),
  495: 
  496: 		    %% Delete one replica
  497: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:del_table_copy(Tab, Node2)),
  498: 		    ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [Node1], [], [Node3], Nodes)),
  499: 
  500: 		    %% Move one replica
  501: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:move_table_copy(Tab, Node1, Node2)),
  502: 		    ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [Node2], [], [Node3], Nodes)),
  503: 
  504: 		    %% Change replica type
  505: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, Node2, ram_copies)),
  506: 		    ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [], [Node2], [Node3], Nodes))
  507: 	    end,
  508:     Check(replica_location, [{disc_only_copies, [Node1]},
  509: 			     {ram_copies, [Node2]}, {disc_copies, [Node3]}]),
  510: 
  511:     Check(ext_location, [{disc_only_copies, [Node1]},
  512: 			 {ext_ram_copies, [Node2]}, {disc_copies, [Node3]}]),
  513: 
  514:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  515: 
  516: table_lifecycle(suite) -> [];
  517: table_lifecycle(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  518:     [Node1, Node2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
  519: 
  520:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table([{type, bag},
  521: 					      {ram_copies, [Node1]},
  522: 					      {attributes, [rajtan, tajtan]},
  523: 					      {name, order_of_args}])),
  524:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_read({order_of_args, 4711})),
  525:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table([{name, already_exists},
  526: 					      {ram_copies, [Node1]}])),
  527:     ?match({aborted, Reason23 } when element(1, Reason23) ==already_exists,
  528: 	   mnesia:create_table([{name, already_exists},
  529: 				{ram_copies, [Node1]}])),
  530:     ?match({aborted, Reason21 } when element(1, Reason21) == bad_type,
  531:            mnesia:create_table([{name, bad_node}, {ram_copies, ["foo"]}])),
  532:     ?match({aborted, Reason2} when element(1, Reason2) == bad_type,
  533:            mnesia:create_table([{name, zero_arity}, {attributes, []}])),
  534:     ?match({aborted, Reason3} when element(1, Reason3) == badarg,
  535:            mnesia:create_table([])),
  536:     ?match({aborted, Reason4} when element(1, Reason4) == badarg,
  537:            mnesia:create_table(atom)),
  538:     ?match({aborted, Reason5} when element(1, Reason5) == badarg,
  539:            mnesia:create_table({cstruct, table_name_as_atom})),
  540:     ?match({aborted, Reason6 } when element(1, Reason6) == bad_type,
  541:            mnesia:create_table([{name, no_host}, {ram_copies, foo}])),
  542:     ?match({aborted, Reason7 } when element(1, Reason7) == bad_type,
  543:            mnesia:create_table([{name, no_host}, {disc_only_copies, foo}])),
  544:     ?match({aborted, Reason8} when element(1, Reason8) == bad_type,
  545:            mnesia:create_table([{name, no_host}, {disc_copies, foo}])),
  546: 
  547:     CreateFun =
  548:         fun() -> ?match({aborted, nested_transaction},
  549:                         mnesia:create_table([{name, nested_trans}])), ok
  550:         end,
  551:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(CreateFun)),
  552:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table([{name, remote_tab},
  553: 					      {ram_copies, [Node2]}])),
  554: 
  555:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table([{name, a_brand_new_tab},
  556: 					      {ram_copies, [Node1]}])),
  557:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_read({a_brand_new_tab, 4711})),
  558:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:delete_table(a_brand_new_tab)),
  559:     ?match({'EXIT', {aborted, Reason31}} when element(1, Reason31) == no_exists,
  560:            mnesia:dirty_read({a_brand_new_tab, 4711})),
  561:     ?match({aborted, Reason41} when element(1, Reason41) == no_exists,
  562:            mnesia:delete_table(a_brand_new_tab)),
  563:     ?match({aborted, Reason9} when element(1, Reason9) == badarg,
  564:            mnesia:create_table([])),
  565: 
  566:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table([{name, nested_del_trans},
  567: 					      {ram_copies, [Node1]}])),
  568: 
  569:     DeleteFun = fun() -> ?match({aborted, nested_transaction},
  570:                                 mnesia:delete_table(nested_del_trans)), ok end,
  571:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(DeleteFun)),
  572: 
  573:     ?match({aborted, Reason10} when element(1, Reason10) == bad_type,
  574:            mnesia:create_table([{name, create_with_index}, {index, 2}])),
  575:     ?match({aborted, Reason32} when element(1, Reason32) == bad_type,
  576:            mnesia:create_table([{name, create_with_index}, {index, [-1]}])),
  577:     ?match({aborted, Reason33} when element(1, Reason33) == bad_type,
  578:            mnesia:create_table([{name, create_with_index}, {index, [0]}])),
  579:     ?match({aborted, Reason34} when element(1, Reason34) == bad_type,
  580:            mnesia:create_table([{name, create_with_index}, {index, [1]}])),
  581:     ?match({aborted, Reason35} when element(1, Reason35) == bad_type,
  582:            mnesia:create_table([{name, create_with_index}, {index, [2]}])),
  583:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  584:            mnesia:create_table([{name, create_with_index}, {index, [3]},
  585:                                 {ram_copies, [Node1]}])),
  586: 
  587:     ets:new(ets_table, [named_table]),
  588:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:create_table(ets_table, [{ram_copies, Nodes}])),
  589:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:create_table(ets_table, [{ram_copies, [Node1]}])),
  590:     ets:delete(ets_table),
  591:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(ets_table, [{ram_copies, [Node1]}])),
  592:     ?match(Node1, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia_lib, val, [{ets_table,where_to_read}])),
  593:     ?match(Node1, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia_lib, val, [{ets_table,where_to_read}])),
  594:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(ets_table, Node1, disc_only_copies)),    
  595:     ?match(Node1, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia_lib, val, [{ets_table,where_to_read}])),
  596:     
  597:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  598:
