  600: storage_options(suite) -> [];
  601: storage_options(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  602:     [N1,N2,N3] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
  603: 
  604:     ?match({aborted,_}, mnesia:create_table(a, [{storage_properties, [{ets,foobar}]}])),
  605:     ?match({aborted,_}, mnesia:create_table(a, [{storage_properties, [{ets,[foobar]}]}])),
  606:     ?match({aborted,_}, mnesia:create_table(a, [{storage_properties, [{ets,[duplicate_bag]}]}])),
  607:     ?match({aborted,_}, mnesia:create_table(a, [{storage_properties, [{dets,[{type,bag}]}]}])),
  608: 
  609:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(a, [{ram_copies, [N1]},
  610: 						 {disc_only_copies, [N2]},
  611: 						 {storage_properties,
  612: 						  [{ets,[compressed]},
  613: 						   {dets, [{auto_save, 5000}]} ]}])),
  614:     ?match(true, ets:info(a, compressed)),
  615:     ?match(5000, rpc:call(N2, dets, info, [a, auto_save])),
  616:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({a,1,1})),
  617:     ?match([{a,1,1}], mnesia:dirty_read({a,1})),
  618:     mnesia:dump_log(),
  619:     W2C1 = [{N2, disc_only_copies}, {N1, ram_copies}],
  620:     ?match(W2C1, lists:sort(rpc:call(N2, mnesia_lib, val, [{a, where_to_commit}]))),
  621:     ?match(W2C1, lists:sort(rpc:call(N3, mnesia_lib, val, [{a, where_to_commit}]))),
  622:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(a, N1, disc_only_copies)),
  623:     W2C2 = [{N2, disc_only_copies}, {N1, disc_only_copies}],
  624:     ?match(W2C2, lists:sort(rpc:call(N2, mnesia_lib, val, [{a, where_to_commit}]))),
  625:     ?match(W2C2, lists:sort(rpc:call(N3, mnesia_lib, val, [{a, where_to_commit}]))),
  626:     ?match(undefined, ets:info(a, compressed)),
  627:     ?match(5000, dets:info(a, auto_save)),
  628:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(a, N1, disc_copies)),
  629:     ?match(true, ets:info(a, compressed)),
  630: 
  631:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  632: 
  633: 
  634: clear_table_during_load(suite) -> [];
  635: clear_table_during_load(doc) ->
  636:     ["Clear table caused during load caused a schema entry in the actual tab"];
  637: clear_table_during_load(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  638:     Nodes = [_, Node2] = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config ++ [{tc_timeout, timer:minutes(2)}]),
  639:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:create_table(cleartab, [{ram_copies, Nodes}])),
  640:     Tester = self(),
  641:     Bin = <<"Testingasdasd", 0:32000>>,
  642:     Fill =  fun() -> [mnesia:write({cleartab, N, Bin}) || N <- lists:seq(1, 3000)], ok end,
  643:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:sync_transaction(Fill)),
  644: 
  645:     StopAndStart = fun() ->
  646: 			   stopped = mnesia:stop(),
  647: 			   Tester ! {self(), stopped},
  648: 			   receive start_node -> ok end,
  649: 			   ok = mnesia:start(),
  650: 			   ok = mnesia:wait_for_tables([cleartab], 2000),
  651: 			   lists:foreach(fun({cleartab,_,_}) -> ok;
  652: 					    (What) -> Tester ! {failed, What},
  653: 						      unlink(Tester),
  654: 						      exit(foo)
  655: 					 end,
  656: 					 ets:tab2list(cleartab)),
  657: 			   Tester ! {self(), ok},
  658: 			   normal
  659: 		   end,
  660: 
  661:     Test = fun(N) ->
  662: 		   Pid = spawn_link(Node2, StopAndStart),
  663: 		   receive {Pid, stopped} -> ok end,
  664: 		   Pid ! start_node,
  665: 		   timer:sleep(N*10),
  666: 		   {atomic, ok} = mnesia:clear_table(cleartab),
  667: 		   receive
  668: 		       {Pid, ok} -> ok;
  669: 		       {failed, What} ->
  670: 			   io:format("Failed in ~p tries, with ~p~n",[N, What]),
  671: 			   exit({error, What});
  672: 		       {'EXIT', Pid, Reason} ->
  673: 			   exit({died, Reason})
  674: 		   end
  675: 	   end,
  676:     [Test(N) || N <- lists:seq(1, 10)],
  677:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  678: 
  679: 
  680: add_copy_conflict(suite) -> [];
  681: add_copy_conflict(doc) -> 
  682:     ["Verify that OTP-5065 doesn't happen again, whitebox testing"];
  683: add_copy_conflict(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  684:     Nodes = [Node1, Node2] = 
  685: 	?acquire_nodes(2, Config ++ [{tc_timeout, timer:minutes(2)}]),
  686:     
  687:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(a, [{ram_copies, Nodes}])),
  688:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(b, [{ram_copies, Nodes}])),
  689:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(test, [{ram_copies, [Node2]}])),            
  690:     mnesia:stop(),
  691:     ?match(ok,mnesia:start([{no_table_loaders, 1}])),
  692: 
  693:     verify_ll_queue(10),
  694: 
  695:     Self = self(),
  696:     Test = fun() ->
  697: 		   Res = mnesia:add_table_copy(test, Node1, ram_copies),
  698: 		   Self ! {test, Res}
  699: 	   end,
  700:     %% Create conflict with loader queue.
  701:     spawn_link(Test),
  702:     ?match_receive(timeout),
  703:     %% Conflict ok
  704:     mnesia_controller:unblock_controller(),
  705:     
  706:     ?match_receive({test, {atomic,ok}}),
  707:     ?match(ok, mnesia:wait_for_tables([a,b], 3000)),
  708:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []),
  709:     ?cleanup(1, Config).
  710: 
  711: verify_ll_queue(0) ->
  712:     ?error("Couldn't find anything in queue~n",[]);
  713: verify_ll_queue(N) ->
  714:     ?match(granted,mnesia_controller:block_controller()),
  715:     case mnesia_controller:get_info(1000) of
  716: 	{info,{state,_,true,[],_Loader,[],[],[],_,_,_,_,_,_}} ->
  717: 	    %% Very slow SMP machines haven't loaded it yet..
  718: 	    mnesia_controller:unblock_controller(),
  719: 	    timer:sleep(10),
  720: 	    verify_ll_queue(N-1);
  721: 	{info,{state,_,true,[],Loader,LL,[],[],_,_,_,_,_,_}} ->
  722: 	    io:format("~p~n", [{Loader,LL}]),
  723: 	    ?match([_], LL);  %% Verify that something is in the loader queue
  724: 	Else ->
  725: 	    ?error("No match ~p maybe the internal format has changed~n",[Else])
  726:     end.
  727: 
  728: add_copy_when_going_down(suite) -> [];
  729: add_copy_when_going_down(doc) -> 
  730:     ["Tests abort when node we load from goes down"];
  731: add_copy_when_going_down(Config) -> 
  732:     [Node1, Node2] = 
  733: 	?acquire_nodes(2, Config ++ [{tc_timeout, timer:minutes(2)}]),
  734:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(a, [{ram_copies, [Node1]}])),
  735:     %% Grab a write lock 
  736:     Tester = self(),
  737:     WriteAndWait = fun() -> 
  738: 			   mnesia:write({a,1,1}),
  739: 			   Tester ! {self(), got_lock},
  740: 			   receive continue -> ok
  741: 			   end
  742: 		   end,
  743:     Locker = spawn(fun() -> mnesia:transaction(WriteAndWait) end),
  744:     receive {Locker, got_lock} -> ok end,
  745: 
  746:     spawn_link(fun() -> Res = rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, add_table_copy,
  747: 				       [a, Node2, ram_copies]),
  748: 			Tester ! {test, Res}
  749: 	       end),
  750:     %% We have a lock here we should get a timeout
  751:     ?match_receive(timeout),
  752:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([Node1]),
  753:     ?match_receive({test,{aborted,_}}),
  754:     ?verify_mnesia([Node2], []).
  755: 
  756: add_copy_when_dst_going_down(suite) -> [];
  757: add_copy_when_dst_going_down(doc) ->
  758:     ["Table copy destination node goes down. Verify that the issue fixed in erlang/otp#6013 doesn't happen again, whitebox testing."];
  759: add_copy_when_dst_going_down(Config) ->
  760:     [Node1, Node2] = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
  761:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(a, [{ram_copies, [Node1]}])),
  762:     lists:foreach(fun(I) ->
  763:                           ok = mnesia:sync_dirty(fun() -> mnesia:write({a, I, I}) end)
  764:                   end,
  765:                   lists:seq(1, 100000)),
  766:     ?match({ok, _}, mnesia:change_config(extra_db_nodes, [Node2])),
  767: 
  768:     %% Start table copy
  769:     Tester = self(),
  770:     spawn_link(fun() ->
  771:                        mnesia:add_table_copy(a, Node2, ram_copies),
  772:                        Tester ! add_table_copy_finished
  773:                end),
  774:     timer:sleep(10),  % Wait for `mnesia_loader:send_more/6` has started
  775: 
  776:     %% Grab a write lock
  777:     spawn_link(fun() ->
  778:                        Fun = fun() ->
  779:                                      ok = mnesia:write_lock_table(a),
  780:                                      Tester ! {write_lock_acquired, self()},
  781:                                      receive node2_mnesia_killed -> ok
  782:                                      end,
  783:                                      Tester ! write_lock_released,
  784:                                      ok
  785:                              end,
  786:                        mnesia:transaction(Fun)
  787:                end),
  788:     receive {write_lock_acquired, Locker} -> ok
  789:     end,
  790:     timer:sleep(200),  % Wait for `mnesia_loader:send_more/6` has finished
  791:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([Node2])),
  792:     Locker ! node2_mnesia_killed,
  793: 
  794:     receive write_lock_released -> ok
  795:     end,
  796:     receive add_table_copy_finished -> ok
  797:     end,
  798:     timer:sleep(1000),  % Wait for `mnesia_loader:finish_copy/5` has acquired the read lock
  799: 
  800:     %% Grab a write lock
  801:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write_lock_table(a) end, 10)),
  802:     ?verify_mnesia([Node1], []).
  803: 
  804: add_copy_with_down(suite) -> [];
  805: add_copy_with_down(Config) ->
  806:     %% Allow add_table_copy() with ram_copies even all other replicas are down
  807:     Nodes = [Node1, Node2, Node3] = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
  808:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(a, [{ram_copies, [Node3]}, {disc_copies, [Node2]}])),
  809:     stopped = rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, stop, []),
  810:     stopped = rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, stop, []),
  811:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:add_table_copy(a, Node1, ram_copies)),
  812:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:del_table_copy(a, Node2)),
  813:     ok = rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, start, []),
  814:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:add_table_copy(a, Node1, ram_copies)),
  815:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([Node2], [a])),
  816:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(a, Node2, ram_copies)),
  817:     stopped = rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, stop, []),
  818:     stopped = rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, stop, []),
  819:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:add_table_copy(a, Node1, ram_copies)),
  820:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({a,1,1})),
  821:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([Node2,Node3], [a])),
  822:     ?match([{a,1,1}], rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, dirty_read, [{a,1}])),
  823:     ?match([{a,1,1}], rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_read, [{a,1}])),
  824:     ?match([{a,1,1}], rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, dirty_read, [{a,1}])),
  825: 
  826:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:del_table_copy(a, Node1)),
  827:     stopped = rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, stop, []),
  828:     stopped = rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, stop, []),
  829:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:add_table_copy(a, Node1, disc_copies)),
  830:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({a,1,1})),
  831:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([Node2,Node3], [a])),
  832:     ?match([{a,1,1}], rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, dirty_read, [{a,1}])),
  833:     ?match([{a,1,1}], rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_read, [{a,1}])),
  834:     ?match([{a,1,1}], rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, dirty_read, [{a,1}])),
  835: 
  836:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:del_table_copy(a, Node1)),
  837:     stopped = rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, stop, []),
  838:     stopped = rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, stop, []),
  839:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:add_table_copy(a, Node1, disc_only_copies)),
  840:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({a,1,1})),
  841:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([Node2,Node3], [a])),
  842:     ?match([{a,1,1}], rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, dirty_read, [{a,1}])),
  843:     ?match([{a,1,1}], rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_read, [{a,1}])),
  844:     ?match([{a,1,1}], rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, dirty_read, [{a,1}])),
  845: 
  846:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
  847: 
  848: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  849: %% Add, drop and move replicas, change storage types
  850: %% Change table layout (only arity change supported)
  851: 
  852: -record(replica_management, {k, v}).
  853: -record(new_replica_management, {k, v, extra}).
  854: 
  855: -define(SS(R), lists:sort(element(1,R))).
  856: 
  857: replica_management(doc) ->
  858:     "Add, drop and move replicas, change storage types.";
  859: replica_management(suite) ->
  860:     [];
  861: replica_management(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  862:     %% add_table_copy/3, del_table_copy/2, move_table_copy/3,
  863:     %% change_table_copy_type/3, transform_table/3
  864: 
  865:     Nodes = [Node1, Node2, Node3] = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
  866: 
  867:     Tab = replica_management,
  868:     Attrs = record_info(fields, replica_management),
  869: 
  870:     %%
  871:     %% Add, delete and change replicas
  872:     %%
  873:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  874:            mnesia:create_table([{name, Tab}, {attributes, Attrs},
  875:                                 {ram_copies, [Node1]}, {ext_ram_copies, [Node3]}])),
  876:     [?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, K, K + 2})) || K <-lists:seq(1, 10)],
  877:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [], [Node1, Node3], [], Nodes)),
  878:     %% R - -
  879:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:dump_tables([Tab])),
  880:     ?match({aborted,  Reason50 } when element(1, Reason50) == combine_error,
  881: 	   mnesia:add_table_copy(Tab, Node2, disc_copies)),
  882:     ?match({aborted,  Reason51 } when element(1, Reason51) == combine_error,
  883:            mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, Node1, disc_copies)),
  884:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:clear_table(Tab)),
  885:     SyncedCheck = fun() ->
  886: 			  mnesia:lock({record,Tab,0}, write),
  887: 			  ?match([0,0,0], ?SS(rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size])))
  888: 		  end,
  889:     mnesia:transaction(SyncedCheck),
  890: 
  891:     ?match({[0,0,0], []}, rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size])),
  892:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:del_table_copy(Tab, Node1)),
  893:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:del_table_copy(Tab, Node3)),
  894:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [], [], [], Nodes)),
  895:     %% - - -
  896:     ?match({aborted,Reason52} when element(1, Reason52) ==  no_exists,
  897:            mnesia:add_table_copy(Tab, Node3, ram_copies)),
  898: 
  899:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table([{name, Tab},
  900: 					      {attributes, Attrs},
  901: 					      {disc_copies, [Node1]}])),
  902:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [], [], [Node1], Nodes)),
  903:     %% D - -
  904:     [?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, K, K + 2})) || K <-lists:seq(1, 10)],
  905: 
  906:     ?match({aborted,  Reason53} when element(1, Reason53) == badarg,
  907:            mnesia:add_table_copy(Tab, Node2, bad_storage_type)),
  908:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:add_table_copy(Tab, Node2, disc_only_copies)),
  909:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [Node2], [], [Node1], Nodes)),
  910:     ?match([0,10,10], ?SS(rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size]))),
  911:     %% D DO -
  912:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:add_table_copy(Tab, Node3, ext_ram_copies)),
  913:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [Node2], [Node3], [Node1], Nodes)),
  914:     ?match([10,10,10], ?SS(rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size]))),
  915:     %% D DO R
  916:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  917:            mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, Node1, disc_only_copies)),
  918:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [Node1, Node2], [Node3], [], Nodes)),
  919:     ?match([10,10,10], ?SS(rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size]))),
  920:     %% DO DO R
  921:     ?match({aborted,  Reason54} when element(1, Reason54) == already_exists,
  922:            mnesia:add_table_copy(Tab, Node3, ram_copies)),
  923:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:del_table_copy(Tab, Node1)),
  924:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [Node2], [Node3], [], Nodes)),
  925:     %% - DO R
  926:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:del_table_copy(Tab, Node1)),
  927:     ?match(Tab, ets:new(Tab, [named_table])),
  928:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:add_table_copy(Tab, Node1, disc_copies)),
  929:     ?match(true, ets:delete(Tab)),
  930:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:add_table_copy(Tab, Node1, disc_copies)),
  931:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [Node2], [Node3], [Node1], Nodes)),
  932:     ?match([10,10,10], ?SS(rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size]))),
  933:     %% D DO R
  934:     ?match({atomic, ok},mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, Node3, disc_only_copies)),
  935:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [Node2, Node3], [], [Node1], Nodes)),
  936:     ?match([10,10,10], ?SS(rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size]))),
  937: 
  938:     %% D DO D0
  939:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, Node3, ext_ram_copies)),
  940:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [Node2], [Node3], [Node1], Nodes)),
  941:     ?match([10,10,10], ?SS(rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size]))),
  942:     %% D DO R
  943:     ?match({atomic, ok},
  944:            mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, Node2, disc_copies)),
  945:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [], [Node3], [Node1,Node2], Nodes)),
  946:     ?match([10,10,10], ?SS(rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size]))),
  947: 
  948:     %% D D R
  949:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, Node1, disc_only_copies)),
  950:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [Node1], [Node3], [Node2], Nodes)),
  951:     ?match([10,10,10], ?SS(rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size]))),
  952: 
  953:     %% DO D R
  954:     ?match(Tab, ets:new(Tab, [named_table])),
  955:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, Node1, ram_copies)),
  956:     ?match(true, ets:delete(Tab)),
  957:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, Node1, ram_copies)),
  958:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [], [Node3,Node1], [Node2], Nodes)),
  959:     ?match([10,10,10], ?SS(rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size]))),
  960:     %% R D R
  961:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, Node1, disc_copies)),
  962:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [], [Node3], [Node2,Node1], Nodes)),
  963:     ?match([10,10,10], ?SS(rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size]))),
  964: 
  965:     %% D D R
  966:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, Node2, disc_only_copies)),
  967:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [Node2], [Node3], [Node1], Nodes)),
  968:     ?match([10,10,10], ?SS(rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size]))),
  969: 
  970:     %% D DO R
  971:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, Node3, disc_only_copies)),
  972:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [Node2, Node3], [], [Node1], Nodes)),
  973:     ?match([10,10,10], ?SS(rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size]))),
  974:     %% D DO DO
  975:     %% test clear
  976:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:clear_table(Tab)),
  977:     mnesia:transaction(SyncedCheck),
  978: 
  979:     %% rewrite for rest of testcase
  980:     [?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, K, K + 2})) || K <-lists:seq(1, 10)],
  981: 
  982:     %% D DO DO
  983:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:del_table_copy(Tab, Node2)),
  984:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [Node3], [], [Node1], Nodes)),
  985:     %% D - DO
  986:     ?match({aborted,  Reason55} when element(1, Reason55) == already_exists,
  987:            mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, Node1, disc_copies)),
  988: 
  989:     %%
  990:     %% Move replica
  991:     %%
  992:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:move_table_copy(Tab, Node1, Node2)),
  993:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [Node3], [], [Node2], Nodes)),
  994:     ?match([0,10,10], ?SS(rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size]))),
  995:     %% - D DO
  996:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(Tab, Node3, ext_ram_copies)),
  997:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [], [Node3], [Node2], Nodes)),
  998:     ?match([0,10,10], ?SS(rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size]))),
  999:     %% - D ER
 1000:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:move_table_copy(Tab, Node3, Node1)),
 1001:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [], [Node1], [Node2], Nodes)),
 1002:     ?match([0,10,10], ?SS(rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size]))),
 1003:     %% ER D -
 1004: 
 1005:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:move_table_copy(Tab, Node1, Node2)),
 1006:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:move_table_copy(Tab, Node3, Node2)),
 1007:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:move_table_copy(Tab, Node1, Node3)),
 1008:     %% - D ER
 1009:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([Node3])),
 1010:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write({Tab, 43, sync_me}) end)),
 1011:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [], [Node3], [Node2],Nodes -- [Node3])),
 1012:     %% - D ER
 1013:     ?match({aborted,Reason56} when element(1, Reason56) == not_active,
 1014: 	   mnesia:move_table_copy(Tab, Node3, Node1)),
 1015:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [], [Node3], [Node2],Nodes -- [Node3])),
 1016:     %% - D ER
 1017:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([Node3])),
 1018:     ?match([], ?vrl(Tab, [], [Node3], [Node2], Nodes)),
 1019:     %% - D ER
 1020:     ?match([{Tab,43,sync_me}], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab,43})),
 1021:     
 1022:     %%
 1023:     %% Transformer
 1024:     %%
 1025: 
 1026:     NewAttrs = record_info(fields, new_replica_management),
 1027:     Transformer =
 1028:         fun(Rec) when is_record(Rec, replica_management) -> 
 1029: 		#new_replica_management{k = Rec#replica_management.k,
 1030: 					v = Rec#replica_management.v,
 1031: 					extra = Rec#replica_management.k * 2}
 1032:         end,
 1033:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transform_table(Tab, fun(R) -> R end, Attrs)),
 1034:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transform_table(Tab, Transformer, NewAttrs, new_replica_management)),
 1035: 
 1036:     ERlist = [#new_replica_management{k = K, v = K+2, extra = K*2} || K <- lists:seq(1, 10)],
 1037:     ARlist = [hd(mnesia:dirty_read(Tab, K)) || K <- lists:seq(1, 10)],
 1038: 
 1039:     ?match(ERlist, ARlist),
 1040: 
 1041:     ?match({aborted,  Reason56} when element(1, Reason56) == bad_type,
 1042:            mnesia:transform_table(Tab, Transformer, 0)),
 1043:     ?match({aborted, Reason57} when element(1, Reason57) ==  bad_type,
 1044:            mnesia:transform_table(Tab, Transformer, -1)),
 1045:     ?match({aborted, Reason58} when element(1, Reason58) ==  bad_type,
 1046:            mnesia:transform_table(Tab, Transformer, [])),
 1047:     ?match({aborted,  Reason59} when element(1, Reason59) == bad_type,
 1048:            mnesia:transform_table(Tab, no_fun, NewAttrs)),
 1049:     ?match({aborted,  Reason59} when element(1, Reason59) == bad_type,
 1050:            mnesia:transform_table(Tab, fun(X) -> X end, NewAttrs, {tuple})),
 1051: 
 1052:     %% OTP-3878 
 1053:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transform_table(Tab, ignore, 
 1054:                                                 NewAttrs ++ [dummy])),
 1055:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transform_table(Tab, ignore, 
 1056:                                                 NewAttrs ++ [dummy], last_rec)),
 1057: 
 1058:     ARlist = [hd(mnesia:dirty_read(Tab, K)) || K <- lists:seq(1, 10)],
 1059:     ?match({'EXIT',{aborted,{bad_type,_}}},
 1060:            mnesia:dirty_write(Tab, #new_replica_management{})),
 1061:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(Tab, {last_rec, k, v, e, dummy})),
 1062: 
 1063:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1064: 
 1065: schema_availability(doc) ->
 1066:     ["Test that schema succeeds (or fails) as intended when some db nodes are down."];
 1067: schema_availability(suite) ->
 1068:     [];
 1069: schema_availability(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1070:     [N1, _N2, N3] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
 1071:     Tab = schema_availability,
 1072:     Storage = mnesia_test_lib:storage_type(ram_copies, Config),
 1073:     Def1 = [{Storage, [N1, N3]}],
 1074:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, Def1)),
 1075: 
 1076:     N = 10,
 1077:     ?match(ok, mnesia:sync_dirty(fun() -> [mnesia:write({Tab, K, K + 2}) || K <- lists:seq(1, N)], ok end)),
 1078:     ?match({[N,0,N], []}, rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size])),
 1079:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([N3])),
 1080:     ?match({[N,0,0], []}, rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size])),
 1081: 
 1082:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([N3], [Tab])),
 1083:     ?match({[N,0,N], []}, rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size])),
 1084:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([N3])),
 1085: 
 1086:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:clear_table(Tab)),
 1087:     ?match({[0,0,0], []}, rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size])),
 1088: 
 1089:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([N3], [Tab])),
 1090:     ?match({[0,0,0], []}, rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size])),
 1091: 
 1092:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1093: 
 1094: -define(badrpc(Tab), {badrpc, {'EXIT', {aborted,{no_exists,Tab}}}}).
 1095: 
 1096: local_content(doc) ->
 1097:     ["Test local_content functionality, we want to see that correct"
 1098:      " properties gets propageted correctly between nodes"];
 1099: local_content(suite) -> [];
 1100: local_content(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1101:     [Node1, Node2, Node3] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config), 
 1102:     Tab1 = local1,
 1103:     Def1 = [{local_content, true}, {ram_copies, Nodes}],
 1104:     Tab2 = local2,
 1105:     Def2 = [{local_content, true}, {disc_copies, [Node1]}],
 1106:     Tab3 = local3,
 1107:     Def3 = [{local_content, true}, {disc_only_copies, [Node1]}],
 1108:     Tab4 = local4,
 1109:     Def4 = [{local_content, true}, {ram_copies, [Node1]}],
 1110: 
 1111:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab1, Def1)),
 1112:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab2, Def2)),
 1113:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab3, Def3)),
 1114:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab4, Def4)),
 1115: 
 1116:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, dirty_write, [{Tab1, 1, Node1}])),
 1117:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_write, [{Tab1, 1, Node2}])),
 1118:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, dirty_write, [{Tab1, 1, Node3}])),
 1119:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, dirty_write, [{Tab2, 1, Node1}])),
 1120:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, dirty_write, [{Tab3, 1, Node1}])),
 1121:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, dirty_write, [{Tab4, 1, Node1}])),
 1122: 
 1123:     ?match(?badrpc(Tab2), rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_write, [{Tab2, 1, Node2}])),
 1124:     ?match(?badrpc(Tab3), rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_write, [{Tab3, 1, Node2}])),
 1125:     ?match(?badrpc(Tab4), rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_write, [{Tab4, 1, Node2}])),
 1126: 
 1127:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, add_table_copy, [Tab2, Node2, ram_copies])),    
 1128:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, add_table_copy, [Tab3, Node2, disc_copies])),
 1129:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, add_table_copy, [Tab4, Node2, disc_only_copies])),
 1130:     ?match([], rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab2, 1}])),
 1131:     ?match([], rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab3, 1}])),
 1132:     ?match([], rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab4, 1}])),
 1133: 
 1134:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_write, [{Tab2, 1, Node2}])),
 1135:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_write, [{Tab3, 1, Node2}])),
 1136:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_write, [{Tab4, 1, Node2}])),
 1137: 
 1138:     ?match([{Tab1, 1, Node1}], rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab1, 1}])),
 1139:     ?match([{Tab2, 1, Node1}], rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab2, 1}])),
 1140:     ?match([{Tab3, 1, Node1}], rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab3, 1}])),
 1141:     ?match([{Tab4, 1, Node1}], rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab4, 1}])),
 1142: 
 1143:     ?match([{Tab1, 1, Node2}], rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab1, 1}])),
 1144:     ?match([{Tab2, 1, Node2}], rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab2, 1}])),
 1145:     ?match([{Tab3, 1, Node2}], rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab3, 1}])),
 1146:     ?match([{Tab4, 1, Node2}], rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab4, 1}])),
 1147: 
 1148:     ?match([{Tab1, 1, Node3}], rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab1, 1}])),
 1149:     ?match(?badrpc([_Tab2, 1]), rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab2, 1}])),
 1150:     ?match(?badrpc([_Tab3, 1]), rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab3, 1}])),
 1151:     ?match(?badrpc([_Tab4, 1]), rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab4, 1}])),
 1152: 
 1153:     ?match({atomic, ok}, 
 1154: 	   mnesia:change_table_copy_type(schema, Node3, ram_copies)),
 1155:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([Node3])),
 1156: 
 1157:     %% Added for OTP-44306
 1158:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, start, [[{schema, ?BACKEND}]])),
 1159:     ?match({ok, _}, mnesia:change_config(extra_db_nodes, [Node3])),
 1160: 
 1161:     mnesia_test_lib:sync_tables([Node3], [Tab1]),
 1162: 
 1163:     ?match([], rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, dirty_read, [{Tab1, 1}])),
 1164: 
 1165:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, clear_table, [Tab1])),
 1166:     
 1167:     SyncedCheck = fun(Tab) ->
 1168: 			  mnesia:lock({record,Tab,0}, write),
 1169: 			  {OK, []} = rpc:multicall(Nodes, mnesia, table_info, [Tab, size]),
 1170: 			  OK
 1171: 		  end,
 1172:     ?match({atomic, [0,1,0]}, mnesia:transaction(SyncedCheck, [Tab1])),
 1173:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, clear_table, [Tab2])),    
 1174:     ?match({atomic, [1,0,0]}, mnesia:transaction(SyncedCheck, [Tab2])),
 1175:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, clear_table, [Tab3])),    
 1176:     ?match({atomic, [1,0,0]}, mnesia:transaction(SyncedCheck, [Tab3])),
 1177: 
 1178:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1179: 
 1180: 
 1181: change_table_access_mode(suite) -> [];
 1182: change_table_access_mode(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1183:     [Node1, Node2, Node3] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
 1184:     Tab = test_access_mode_tab,
 1185: 
 1186:     Def = case  mnesia_test_lib:diskless(Config) of
 1187: 	      true -> [{name, Tab}, {ram_copies, Nodes}];
 1188: 	      false -> [{name, Tab}, {ram_copies, [Node1]}, 
 1189: 			{disc_copies, [Node2]},
 1190: 			{disc_only_copies, [Node3]}]
 1191: 	  end,
 1192:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Def)),
 1193: 
 1194:     Write = fun(What) -> mnesia:write({Tab, 1, What}) end,
 1195:     Read = fun() -> mnesia:read({Tab, 1}) end,
 1196: 
 1197:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(Write, [test_ok])),
 1198:     %% test read_only
 1199:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_access_mode(Tab, read_only)),
 1200:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:transaction(Write, [nok])),
 1201:     ?match({'EXIT', {aborted, _}}, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 1, [nok]})),
 1202:     ?match({aborted, _}, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, transaction, [Write, [nok]])),
 1203:     ?match({aborted, _}, rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, transaction, [Write, [nok]])),
 1204:     ?match({atomic, [{Tab, 1, test_ok}]}, mnesia:transaction(Read)),
 1205:     %% test read_write
 1206:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_access_mode(Tab, read_write)),
 1207:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(Write, [test_ok1])),
 1208:     ?match({atomic, [{Tab, 1, test_ok1}]}, mnesia:transaction(Read)),
 1209:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, transaction, [Write, [test_ok2]])),
 1210:     ?match({atomic, [{Tab, 1, test_ok2}]}, mnesia:transaction(Read)),
 1211:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(Node3, mnesia, transaction, [Write, [test_ok3]])),
 1212:     ?match({atomic, [{Tab, 1, test_ok3}]}, mnesia:transaction(Read)),
 1213: 
 1214:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:delete_table(Tab)),
 1215: 
 1216:     Def4 = [{name, Tab}, {access_mode, read_only_bad}],
 1217:     ?match({aborted, {bad_type, _, _}}, mnesia:create_table(Def4)),
 1218: 
 1219:     Def2 = [{name, Tab}, {access_mode, read_only}],
 1220:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Def2)),
 1221:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:transaction(Write, [nok])),
 1222: 
 1223:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_access_mode(Tab, read_write)),
 1224:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:delete_table(Tab)),
 1225: 
 1226:     Def3 = [{name, Tab}, {mnesia_test_lib:storage_type(disc_copies, Config),
 1227: 			  [Node1, Node2]},
 1228: 	    {access_mode, read_write}],
 1229:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Def3)),
 1230:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(Write, [ok])),
 1231:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_access_mode(Tab, read_only)),
 1232:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:del_table_copy(Tab, Node2)),
 1233:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:del_table_copy(Tab, Node1)),
 1234:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:delete_table(Tab)),
 1235:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_access_mode(Tab, read_write)),
 1236: 
 1237:     ?match({aborted, {bad_type, _, _}},
 1238: 	   mnesia:change_table_access_mode(Tab, strange_atom)),
 1239:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:delete_table(Tab)),
 1240: 
 1241:     ?match({aborted, {no_exists, _}}, 
 1242: 	   mnesia:change_table_access_mode(err_tab, read_only)),
 1243:     ?match({aborted, {no_exists, _}}, 
 1244: 	   mnesia:change_table_access_mode([Tab], read_only)),
 1245:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1246: 
 1247: change_table_load_order(suite) -> [];
 1248: change_table_load_order(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1249:     [Node1, Node2, Node3] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
 1250:     Tab1 = load_order_tab1,
 1251:     Tab2 = load_order_tab2,
 1252:     Tab3 = load_order_tab3,
 1253: 
 1254:     Def = case mnesia_test_lib:diskless(Config) of
 1255: 	      true -> [{ram_copies, Nodes}]; 
 1256: 	      false ->		  
 1257: 		  [{ram_copies, [Node1]}, 
 1258: 		   {disc_copies, [Node2]},
 1259: 		   {disc_only_copies, [Node3]}]
 1260: 	  end,
 1261:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab1, Def)),
 1262:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab2, Def)),
 1263:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab3, Def)),
 1264: 
 1265:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:change_table_load_order(Tab1, should_be_integer)),       
 1266:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:change_table_load_order(err_tab, 5)),       
 1267:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:change_table_load_order([err_tab], 5)),       
 1268:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_load_order(Tab1, 5)),       
 1269:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_load_order(Tab2, 4)),    
 1270:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_load_order(Tab3, 73)),
 1271: 
 1272:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:change_table_load_order(schema, -32)),   
 1273: 
 1274:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1275: 
 1276: set_master_nodes(suite) -> [];
 1277: set_master_nodes(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1278:     [Node1, Node2, Node3] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
 1279:     Tab1 = master_node_tab1,
 1280:     Tab2 = master_node_tab2,
 1281:     Tab3 = master_node_tab3,
 1282:     Def1 = [{ram_copies, [Node1, Node2]}],
 1283:     Def2 = [{disc_copies, [Node2, Node3]}],
 1284:     Def3 = [{disc_only_copies, [Node3, Node1]}],
 1285:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab1, Def1)),
 1286:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab2, Def2)),
 1287:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab3, Def3)),
 1288: 
 1289:     ?match({error, _}, mnesia:set_master_nodes(schema, ['hopefully@non.existing.node'])),
 1290:     ?match({error, _}, mnesia:set_master_nodes(badtab, [Node2, Node3])),
 1291:     ?match({error, _}, mnesia:set_master_nodes(Tab1, [Node3])),
 1292:     ?match([], mnesia:table_info(Tab1, master_nodes)),
 1293: 
 1294:     ?match(ok, mnesia:set_master_nodes(schema, [Node3, Node1])),
 1295:     ?match([Node3, Node1], mnesia:table_info(schema, master_nodes)),
 1296:     ?match(ok, mnesia:set_master_nodes(Tab1, [Node2])),
 1297:     ?match([Node2], mnesia:table_info(Tab1, master_nodes)),
 1298:     ?match(ok, mnesia:set_master_nodes(Tab1, [Node2, Node1])),
 1299:     ?match([Node2, Node1], mnesia:table_info(Tab1, master_nodes)),
 1300:     ?match(ok, mnesia:set_master_nodes(Tab2, [Node2])),  % Should set where_to_read to Node2!
 1301:     ?match([Node2], mnesia:table_info(Tab2, master_nodes)),
 1302:     ?match(ok, mnesia:set_master_nodes(Tab3, [Node3])),
 1303:     ?match([Node3], mnesia:table_info(Tab3, master_nodes)),
 1304:     ?match(ok, mnesia:set_master_nodes(Tab3, [])),
 1305:     ?match([], mnesia:table_info(Tab3, master_nodes)),
 1306: 
 1307:     ?match(ok, mnesia:set_master_nodes([Node1])),
 1308:     ?match([Node1], mnesia:table_info(schema, master_nodes)),
 1309:     ?match([Node1], mnesia:table_info(Tab1, master_nodes)),
 1310:     ?match([], mnesia:table_info(Tab2, master_nodes)),
 1311:     ?match([Node1], mnesia:table_info(Tab3, master_nodes)),
 1312: 
 1313:     ?match(ok, mnesia:set_master_nodes([Node1, Node2])),
 1314:     ?match([Node1, Node2], mnesia:table_info(schema, master_nodes)),
 1315:     ?match([Node1, Node2], mnesia:table_info(Tab1, master_nodes)),
 1316:     ?match([Node2], mnesia:table_info(Tab2, master_nodes)),
 1317:     ?match([Node1], mnesia:table_info(Tab3, master_nodes)),
 1318: 
 1319:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1320: 
 1321: offline_set_master_nodes(suite) -> [];
 1322: offline_set_master_nodes(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1323:     [Node] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
 1324:     Tab1 = offline_master_node_tab1,
 1325:     Tab2 = offline_master_node_tab2,
 1326:     Tab3 = offline_master_node_tab3,
 1327:     Tabs = ?sort([Tab1, Tab2, Tab3]),
 1328:     Def1 = [{ram_copies, [Node]}],
 1329:     Def2 = [{disc_copies, [Node]}],
 1330:     Def3 = [{disc_only_copies, [Node]}],
 1331:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab1, Def1)),
 1332:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab2, Def2)),
 1333:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab3, Def3)),
 1334:     ?match([], mnesia:system_info(master_node_tables)),
 1335:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([Node])),
 1336: 
 1337:     ?match(ok, mnesia:set_master_nodes(Tab1, [Node])),
 1338:     ?match(ok, mnesia:set_master_nodes(Tab2, [Node])),
 1339:     ?match(ok, mnesia:set_master_nodes(Tab3, [Node])),
 1340:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([Node])),
 1341:     ?match(Tabs, ?sort(mnesia:system_info(master_node_tables))),
 1342: 
 1343:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([Node])),
 1344:     ?match(ok, mnesia:set_master_nodes(Tab1, [])),
 1345:     ?match(ok, mnesia:set_master_nodes(Tab2, [])),
 1346:     ?match(ok, mnesia:set_master_nodes(Tab3, [])),
 1347:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([Node])),
 1348:     ?match([], mnesia:system_info(master_node_tables)),
 1349: 
 1350:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([Node])),
 1351:     ?match(ok, mnesia:set_master_nodes([Node])),
 1352:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([Node])),
 1353:     AllTabs = ?sort([schema | Tabs]),
 1354:     ?match(AllTabs, ?sort(mnesia:system_info(master_node_tables))),
 1355: 
 1356:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([Node])),
 1357:     ?match(ok, mnesia:set_master_nodes([])),
 1358:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([Node])),
 1359:     ?match([], mnesia:system_info(master_node_tables)),
 1360: 
 1361:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1362: 
 1363: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1364: %% Synchronize table with log or disc
 1365: %%
 1366: 
 1367: %% Dump ram tables on disc
 1368: dump_tables(suite) -> [];
 1369: dump_tables(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1370:     [Node1, Node2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 1371:     Tab = dump_tables,
 1372:     Schema = [{name, Tab}, {attributes, [k, v]}, {ram_copies, [Node2]}],
 1373:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Schema)),
 1374: 
 1375:     %% Dump 10 records
 1376:     Size = 10,
 1377:     Keys = lists:seq(1, Size),
 1378:     Records = [{Tab, A, 7} || A <- Keys],
 1379:     lists:foreach(fun(Rec) -> ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(Rec)) end, Records),
 1380: 
 1381:     AllKeys = fun() -> ?sort(mnesia:all_keys(Tab)) end,
 1382: 
 1383:     ?match({atomic, Keys}, mnesia:transaction(AllKeys)),
 1384:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:dump_tables([Tab])),
 1385: 
 1386:     %% Delete one record
 1387:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_delete({Tab, 5})),
 1388:     Keys2 = lists:delete(5, Keys),
 1389: 
 1390:     ?match({atomic, Keys2}, mnesia:transaction(AllKeys)),
 1391: 
 1392:     %% Check that all 10 is restored after a stop
 1393:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([Node1, Node2])),
 1394:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([Node1, Node2])),
 1395:     ?match(ok, mnesia:wait_for_tables([Tab], infinity)),
 1396: 
 1397:     ?match({atomic, Keys}, mnesia:transaction(AllKeys)),
 1398: 
 1399:     ?match({aborted,Reason} when element(1, Reason) == no_exists,
 1400:            mnesia:dump_tables([foo])),
 1401:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1402: 
 1403: dump_log(suite) -> [];
 1404: dump_log(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1405:     [Node1, Node2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 1406:     Tab = dump_log,
 1407:     Schema = [{name, Tab}, {attributes, [k, v]}, {ram_copies, [Node1, Node2]}],
 1408:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Schema)),
 1409:     Tab1 = dump_log1,
 1410:     Schema1 = [{name, Tab1}, {attributes, [k, v]}, {disc_copies, [Node1]}],
 1411:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Schema1)),
 1412:     Tab2 = dump_log2,
 1413:     Schema2 = [{name, Tab2}, {attributes, [k, v]}, {disc_only_copies, [Node1]}],
 1414:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Schema2)),
 1415: 
 1416:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 1, ok})),
 1417:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab1, 1, ok})),
 1418:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab2, 1, ok})),
 1419: 
 1420:     ?match(dumped, mnesia:dump_log()),
 1421:     ?match(dumped, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dump_log, [])),
 1422: 
 1423:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:change_table_copy_type(schema, Node2, ram_copies)),
 1424:     ?match(dumped, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dump_log, [])),
 1425: 
 1426:     Self = self(),
 1427:     spawn(fun() -> dump_log(100, Self) end),
 1428:     spawn(fun() -> dump_log(100, Self) end),
 1429: 
 1430:     ?match(ok, receive finished -> ok after 3000 -> timeout end),
 1431:     ?match(ok, receive finished -> ok after 3000 -> timeout end),
 1432:     
 1433:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1434: 
 1435: dump_log(N, Tester) when N > 0 ->
 1436:     mnesia:dump_log(),
 1437:     dump_log(N-1, Tester);
 1438: dump_log(_, Tester) ->
 1439:     Tester ! finished.
 1440: 
 1441: 
 1442: wait_for_tables(doc) -> 
 1443:     ["Intf. test of wait_for_tables, see also force_load_table"];
 1444: wait_for_tables(suite) -> [];
 1445: wait_for_tables(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1446:     [Node1, Node2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 1447:     Tab = wf_tab,
 1448:     Schema = [{name, Tab}, {ram_copies, [Node1, Node2]}],
 1449:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Schema)),
 1450:     ?match(ok, mnesia:wait_for_tables([wf_tab], infinity)),
 1451:     ?match(ok, mnesia:wait_for_tables([], timer:seconds(5))),
 1452:     ?match({timeout, [bad_tab]}, mnesia:wait_for_tables([bad_tab], timer:seconds(5))),
 1453:     ?match(ok, mnesia:wait_for_tables([wf_tab], 0)),
 1454:     ?match({error,_}, mnesia:wait_for_tables([wf_tab], -1)),
 1455:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1456: 
 1457: force_load_table(suite) -> [];
 1458: force_load_table(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1459:     [Node1, Node2] = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 1460:     Tab = wf_tab,
 1461: 
 1462:     Schema = [{name, Tab}, {disc_copies, [Node1, Node2]}],
 1463:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Schema)),
 1464:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 1, test_ok})),
 1465:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([Node1]),
 1466:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, dirty_write, [{Tab, 1, test_nok}])),
 1467:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([Node2]),
 1468:     %%    timer:sleep(timer:seconds(5)),
 1469:     ?match(ok, mnesia:start()),
 1470:     ?match({timeout, [Tab]}, mnesia:wait_for_tables([Tab], 5)),
 1471:     ?match({'EXIT', _}, mnesia:dirty_read({Tab, 1})),
 1472:     ?match(yes, mnesia:force_load_table(Tab)),
 1473:     ?match([{Tab, 1, test_ok}], mnesia:dirty_read({Tab, 1})),
 1474: 
 1475:     ?match({error, _}, mnesia:force_load_table(error_tab)),
 1476:     ?verify_mnesia([Node1], [Node2]).
 1477: 
 1478: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1479: 
 1480: user_properties(doc) ->
 1481:     ["Test of reading, writing and deletion of user properties",
 1482:      "Plus initialization of user properties when a table is created",
 1483:      "Do also test mnesia:table_info(Tab, user_properties)"];
 1484: user_properties(suite) -> [];
 1485: user_properties(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1486:     [Node] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
 1487:     Tab1 = user_properties_1,
 1488:     Tab2 = user_properties_2,
 1489:     Tab3 = user_properties_3,
 1490:     Def1 = [{ram_copies, [Node]}, {user_properties, []}],
 1491:     Def2 = [{mnesia_test_lib:storage_type(disc_copies, Config), [Node]}],
 1492:     Def3 = [{mnesia_test_lib:storage_type(disc_only_copies, Config), [Node]}, 
 1493: 	    {user_properties, []}],
 1494: 
 1495:     PropKey = my_prop,
 1496:     Prop = {PropKey, some, elements},
 1497:     Prop2 = {PropKey, some, other, elements},
 1498:     YourProp= {your_prop},
 1499:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab1, Def1)),
 1500:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab2, Def2)),
 1501:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab3, Def3)),
 1502: 
 1503:     ?match([], mnesia:table_info(Tab1, user_properties)),
 1504:     ?match([], mnesia:table_info(Tab2, user_properties)),
 1505:     ?match([], mnesia:table_info(Tab3, user_properties)),
 1506: 
 1507:     ?match({'EXIT', {aborted, {no_exists, {Tab1, user_property, PropKey}}}},
 1508: 	   mnesia:read_table_property(Tab1, PropKey)),
 1509:     ?match({'EXIT', {aborted, {no_exists, {Tab2, user_property, PropKey}}}},
 1510: 	   mnesia:read_table_property(Tab2, PropKey)),
 1511:     ?match({'EXIT', {aborted, {no_exists, {Tab3, user_property, PropKey}}}},
 1512: 	   mnesia:read_table_property(Tab3, PropKey)),
 1513: 
 1514:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:write_table_property(Tab1, Prop)),
 1515:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:write_table_property(Tab2, Prop)),
 1516:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:write_table_property(Tab3, Prop)),
 1517:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:write_table_property(Tab1, YourProp)),
 1518:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:write_table_property(Tab2, YourProp)),
 1519:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:write_table_property(Tab3, YourProp)),
 1520: 
 1521:     ?match(Prop, mnesia:read_table_property(Tab1, PropKey)),
 1522:     ?match(Prop, mnesia:read_table_property(Tab2, PropKey)),
 1523:     ?match(Prop, mnesia:read_table_property(Tab3, PropKey)),
 1524: 
 1525:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:write_table_property(Tab1, Prop2)),
 1526:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:write_table_property(Tab2, Prop2)),
 1527:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:write_table_property(Tab3, Prop2)),
 1528:     ?match(Prop2, mnesia:read_table_property(Tab1, PropKey)),
 1529:     ?match(Prop2, mnesia:read_table_property(Tab2, PropKey)),
 1530:     ?match(Prop2, mnesia:read_table_property(Tab3, PropKey)),
 1531: 
 1532:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:delete_table_property(Tab1, PropKey)),
 1533:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:delete_table_property(Tab2, PropKey)),
 1534:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:delete_table_property(Tab3, PropKey)),
 1535: 
 1536:     ?match([YourProp], mnesia:table_info(Tab1, user_properties)),
 1537:     ?match([YourProp], mnesia:table_info(Tab2, user_properties)),
 1538:     ?match([YourProp], mnesia:table_info(Tab3, user_properties)),
 1539: 
 1540:     Tab4 = user_properties_4,
 1541:     ?match({atomic, ok}, 
 1542: 	   mnesia:create_table(Tab4, [{user_properties, [Prop]}])),
 1543: 
 1544:     ?match([Prop], mnesia:table_info(Tab4, user_properties)),
 1545: 
 1546:     %% Some error cases
 1547: 
 1548:     ?match({aborted, {bad_type, Tab1, {}}},
 1549: 	   mnesia:write_table_property(Tab1, {})),
 1550:     ?match({aborted, {bad_type, Tab1, ali}},
 1551: 	   mnesia:write_table_property(Tab1, ali)),
 1552: 
 1553:     Tab5 = user_properties_5,
 1554:     ?match({aborted, {bad_type, Tab5, {user_properties, {}}}}, 
 1555: 	   mnesia:create_table(Tab5, [{user_properties, {}}])),
 1556:     ?match({aborted, {bad_type, Tab5, {user_properties, ali}}}, 
 1557: 	   mnesia:create_table(Tab5, [{user_properties, ali}])),
 1558:     ?match({aborted, {bad_type, Tab5, {user_properties, [{}]}}}, 
 1559: 	   mnesia:create_table(Tab5, [{user_properties, [{}]}])),
 1560:     ?match({aborted, {bad_type, Tab5, {user_properties, [ali]}}}, 
 1561: 	   mnesia:create_table(Tab5, [{user_properties, [ali]}])),
 1562: 
 1563:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1564: 
 1565: 
 1566: unsupp_user_props(doc) ->
 1567:     ["Simple test of adding user props in a schema_transaction"];
 1568: unsupp_user_props(suite) -> [];
 1569: unsupp_user_props(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1570:     [Node1] = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
 1571:     Tab1 = silly1,
 1572:     Tab2 = silly2,
 1573:     Storage = mnesia_test_lib:storage_type(ram_copies, Config),
 1574: 
 1575:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia,
 1576: 				  create_table, [Tab1, [{Storage, [Node1]}]])),
 1577:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia,
 1578: 				  create_table, [Tab2, [{Storage, [Node1]}]])),
 1579: 
 1580:     F1 = fun() ->
 1581: 		 mnesia_schema:do_write_table_property(
 1582: 		   silly1, {prop, propval1}),
 1583: 		 mnesia_schema:do_write_table_property(
 1584: 		   silly2, {prop, propval2}), % same key as above
 1585: 		 mnesia_schema:do_write_table_property(
 1586: 		   schema, {prop, propval3})  % same key as above
 1587: 	 end,
 1588:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia_schema,
 1589: 				  schema_transaction, [F1])),
 1590: 
 1591:     ?match([{prop,propval1}], rpc:call(Node1, mnesia,
 1592: 				       table_info, [silly1, user_properties])),
 1593:     ?match([{prop,propval2}], rpc:call(Node1, mnesia,
 1594: 				       table_info, [silly2, user_properties])),
 1595:     ?match([_,{prop,propval3}], rpc:call(Node1, mnesia,
 1596: 				       table_info, [schema, user_properties])),
 1597: 
 1598:     F2 = fun() ->
 1599: 		 mnesia_schema:do_write_table_property(
 1600: 		   silly1, {prop, propval1a}),
 1601: 		 mnesia_schema:do_write_table_property(
 1602: 		   silly1, {prop, propval1b})  % same key as above
 1603: 	 end,
 1604:     ?match({atomic, ok}, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia_schema,
 1605: 				  schema_transaction, [F2])),
 1606: 
 1607:     ?match([{prop,propval1b}], rpc:call(Node1, mnesia,
 1608: 					table_info,
 1609: 					[silly1, user_properties])),
 1610:     ?verify_mnesia([Node1], []).
 1611: 
 1612: 
 1613: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1614: 
 1615: 
 1616: snmp_open_table(suite) -> [];
 1617: snmp_open_table(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1618:     [Node1, Node2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 1619:     Tab1 = local_snmp_table,
 1620: 
 1621:     Storage = mnesia_test_lib:storage_type(disc_copies, Config),
 1622:     Def1 = 
 1623: 	case mnesia_test_lib:diskless(Config) of
 1624: 	    true -> [{ram_copies, Nodes}];
 1625: 	    false ->		
 1626: 		[{disc_copies, [Node1]}, {ram_copies, [Node2]}]
 1627: 	end,
 1628: 
 1629:     Tab2 = ext_snmp_table,
 1630:     Def2 = [{Storage, [Node2]}],
 1631:     ErrTab = non_existing_tab,
 1632:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab1, Def1)),
 1633:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab2, Def2)),
 1634:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:snmp_open_table(Tab1, [{key, integer}])),
 1635:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:snmp_open_table(Tab2, [{key, integer}])),
 1636:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:snmp_open_table(ErrTab, [{key, integer}])),
 1637:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1638: 
 1639: snmp_close_table(suite) -> [];
 1640: snmp_close_table(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1641:     [Node1, Node2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 1642:     Tab1 = local_snmp_table,
 1643:     Storage = mnesia_test_lib:storage_type(disc_copies, Config),
 1644:     Def1 = 
 1645: 	case mnesia_test_lib:diskless(Config) of
 1646: 	    true -> [{ram_copies, Nodes}];
 1647: 	    false ->		
 1648: 		[{disc_copies, [Node1]}, {ram_copies, [Node2]}]
 1649: 	end,
 1650: 
 1651:     Tab2 = ext_snmp_table,
 1652:     Def2 = [{snmp, [{key, integer}]}, {Storage, [Node2]}],
 1653:     ErrTab = non_existing_tab,
 1654:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab1, Def1)),
 1655:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab2, Def2)),
 1656:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(no_snmp_tab, [])),
 1657:     add_some_records(Tab1, Tab2, 3),    
 1658:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:snmp_open_table(Tab1, [{key, integer}])),    
 1659:     add_some_records(Tab1, Tab2, 5),    
 1660:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:snmp_close_table(Tab1)),
 1661: 
 1662:     Transform = fun(Tab, Key) ->
 1663: 			[{T,K,V}] = mnesia:read(Tab, Key, write),
 1664: 			mnesia:delete(T,K, write),
 1665: 			mnesia:write({T, {K,K}, V, 43+V})
 1666: 		end,
 1667:     
 1668:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transform_table(Tab1, ignore, [key,val,new])),
 1669:     ?match({atomic, ok},
 1670: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() ->
 1671: 				      mnesia:write_lock_table(Tab1),
 1672: 				      Keys = mnesia:select(Tab1, [{{'_','$1','_'}, [],
 1673: 								   ['$1']}]),
 1674: 				      [Transform(Tab1, Key) || Key <- Keys],
 1675: 				      ok
 1676: 			      end)),
 1677:     ?match([{Tab1, {1, 1}, 1, 44}], mnesia:dirty_read(Tab1, {1, 1})),
 1678:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:snmp_open_table(Tab1, [{key,{integer,integer}}])),
 1679: 
 1680:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:snmp_close_table(Tab2)),
 1681:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transform_table(Tab2, ignore, [key,val,new])),
 1682:     ?match({atomic, ok},
 1683: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() ->
 1684: 				      mnesia:write_lock_table(Tab2),
 1685: 				      Keys = mnesia:select(Tab2, [{{'_','$1','_'}, [],
 1686: 								   ['$1']}]),
 1687: 				      [Transform(Tab2, Key) || Key <- Keys],
 1688: 				      ok
 1689: 			      end)),
 1690:     
 1691:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:snmp_open_table(Tab2, [{key,{integer,integer}}])), 
 1692:     
 1693:     %% Should be aborted ????
 1694:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:snmp_close_table(no_snmp_tab)),
 1695:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:snmp_close_table(ErrTab)),
 1696:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1697: 
 1698: snmp_get_next_index(suite) -> [];
 1699: snmp_get_next_index(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1700:     [Node1, Node2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 1701:     Tab1 = local_snmp_table,
 1702:     Storage = mnesia_test_lib:storage_type(disc_copies, Config),
 1703:     Def1 = 
 1704: 	case mnesia_test_lib:diskless(Config) of
 1705: 	    true -> [{ram_copies, Nodes}];
 1706: 	    false ->		
 1707: 		[{disc_copies, [Node1]}, {ram_copies, [Node2]}]
 1708: 	end,
 1709: 
 1710:     Tab2 = ext_snmp_table,
 1711:     Def2 = [{Storage, [Node2]}],
 1712:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab1, Def1)),
 1713:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab2, Def2)),
 1714:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:snmp_open_table(Tab1, [{key, integer}])),
 1715:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:snmp_open_table(Tab2, [{key, integer}])),
 1716:     add_some_records(Tab1, Tab2, 1),
 1717:     Test = 
 1718: 	fun() ->
 1719: 		%% Test local tables
 1720: 		{success, Res11} = ?match({ok, _}, mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(Tab1,[])),
 1721: 		{ok, Index11} = Res11,
 1722: 		{success, _Res12} = 
 1723: 		    ?match(endOfTable, mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(Tab1, Index11)),
 1724: 		?match({'EXIT',_}, mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(Tab1, endOfTable)),
 1725: 
 1726: 		%% Test external table
 1727: 		{success, Res21} =
 1728: 		    ?match({ok, _}, mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(Tab2, [])),
 1729: 		{ok, Index21} = Res21,
 1730: 		{success, _Res22} = 
 1731: 		    ?match(endOfTable, mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(Tab2, Index21)),
 1732: 
 1733: 		{ok, Row} = mnesia:snmp_get_row(Tab1, Index11),		
 1734: 		?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_delete(Tab1, hd(Index11))),
 1735: 
 1736: 		?match(endOfTable, mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(Tab1,[])),
 1737: 
 1738: 		ok = mnesia:dirty_write(Row), %% Reset to coming tests
 1739: 
 1740: 		%% Test of non existing table
 1741: 		%%?match(endOfTable, mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(ErrTab, [])),
 1742: 		ok
 1743: 	end,
 1744:     ?match(ok, Test()),
 1745:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:transaction(Test)),
 1746:     ?match(ok, mnesia:sync_dirty(Test)),
 1747:     ?match(ok, mnesia:activity(transaction,Test,mnesia)),
 1748: 
 1749:     %%io:format("**********Before ~p~n", [mnesia_lib:val({Tab1,snmp})]),
 1750:     %%io:format(" ~p ~n", [ets:tab2list(mnesia_lib:val({local_snmp_table,{index,snmp}}))]),
 1751:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia(Nodes)),
 1752:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia(Nodes, [Tab1, Tab2])),
 1753:     %%io:format("**********After ~p~n", [mnesia_lib:val({Tab1,snmp})]),
 1754:     %%io:format(" ~p ~n", [ets:tab2list(mnesia_lib:val({local_snmp_table,{index,snmp}}))]),
 1755: 
 1756:     ?match(ok, Test()),
 1757:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:transaction(Test)),
 1758:     ?match(ok, mnesia:sync_dirty(Test)),
 1759:     ?match(ok, mnesia:activity(transaction,Test,mnesia)),
 1760: 
 1761:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1762: 
 1763: add_some_records(Tab1, Tab2, N) ->
 1764:     Recs1 = [{Tab1, I, I} || I <- lists:reverse(lists:seq(1, N))],
 1765:     Recs2 = [{Tab2, I, I} || I <- lists:reverse(lists:seq(20, 20+N-1))],
 1766:     lists:foreach(fun(R) -> mnesia:dirty_write(R) end, Recs1),
 1767:     Fun = fun(R) -> mnesia:write(R) end,
 1768:     Trans = fun() -> lists:foreach(Fun, Recs2) end, 
 1769:     {atomic, ok} = mnesia:transaction(Trans),
 1770:     %% Sync things, so everything gets everywhere!
 1771:     {atomic, ok} = mnesia:sync_transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(lists:last(Recs1)) end),
 1772:     {atomic, ok} = mnesia:sync_transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(lists:last(Recs2)) end),
 1773:     ?sort(Recs1 ++ Recs2).
 1774: 
 1775: snmp_get_row(suite) -> [];
 1776: snmp_get_row(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1777:     [Node1, Node2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 1778:     Tab1 = local_snmp_table,
 1779:     Storage = mnesia_test_lib:storage_type(disc_copies, Config),
 1780:     Def1 = 
 1781: 	case mnesia_test_lib:diskless(Config) of
 1782: 	    true -> [{ram_copies, Nodes}];
 1783: 	    false ->		
 1784: 		[{disc_copies, [Node1]}, {ram_copies, [Node2]}]
 1785: 	end,
 1786:     Tab2 = ext_snmp_table,
 1787:     Def2 = [{Storage, [Node2]}],
 1788:     Tab3 = snmp_table,
 1789:     Def3 = [{Storage, [Node1]}, 
 1790:             {attributes, [key, data1, data2]}],    
 1791: 
 1792:     Setup = fun() ->
 1793: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab1, Def1)),
 1794: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab2, Def2)),
 1795: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab3, Def3)),
 1796: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:snmp_open_table(Tab1, [{key, integer}])),
 1797: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:snmp_open_table(Tab2, [{key, integer}])),
 1798: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:snmp_open_table(
 1799: 					   Tab3, [{key, {fix_string,integer}}])),
 1800: 		    add_some_records(Tab1, Tab2, 1)
 1801: 	    end,
 1802:     Clear = fun() ->
 1803: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:delete_table(Tab1)),
 1804: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:delete_table(Tab2)),
 1805: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:delete_table(Tab3))
 1806: 	    end,
 1807:     Test = 
 1808: 	fun() ->
 1809: 		%% Test local tables
 1810: 		{success, Res11} = 
 1811: 		    ?match({ok, [1]}, mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(Tab1,[])),
 1812: 		{ok, Index11} = Res11,
 1813: 		?match({ok, {Tab1,1,1}}, mnesia:snmp_get_row(Tab1, Index11)),    
 1814: 		?match(endOfTable, mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(Tab1, Index11)),
 1815: 		?match({'EXIT',_}, mnesia:snmp_get_row(Tab1, endOfTable)),
 1816: 		?match(undefined, mnesia:snmp_get_row(Tab1, [73])),
 1817: 		
 1818: 		Add = fun() ->  mnesia:write({Tab3, {"f_string", 3}, data1, data2}) end,
 1819: 		?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(Add)),
 1820:                 {success, {ok, Index31}} = ?match({ok, RowIndex31} when is_list(RowIndex31), 
 1821: 						 mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(Tab3,[])),
 1822: 		?match({ok, Row31} when is_tuple(Row31), 
 1823: 					mnesia:snmp_get_row(Tab3, Index31)),
 1824: 		?match(endOfTable, mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(Tab3, Index31)),
 1825: 		Del = fun() -> mnesia:delete({Tab3,{"f_string",3}}) end,
 1826: 		?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:transaction(Del)),
 1827: 		?match(undefined, mnesia:snmp_get_row(Tab3, "f_string" ++ [3])),
 1828: 		?match(undefined, mnesia:snmp_get_row(Tab3, "f_string" ++ [73])),
 1829: 
 1830:                 %% Test external table
 1831:                 {success, Res21} = ?match({ok,[20]}, mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(Tab2, [])),
 1832: 		{ok, Index21} = Res21,
 1833:                 ?match({ok, Row2} when is_tuple(Row2), mnesia:snmp_get_row(Tab2, Index21)), 
 1834:                 ?match(endOfTable, mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(Tab2, Index21)),
 1835:                 %% Test of non existing table
 1836:                 %% ?match(endOfTable, mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(ErrTab, [])),
 1837:                 ok
 1838: 	end,
 1839:     Setup(),
 1840:     ?match(ok, Test()),
 1841:     Clear(), Setup(),
 1842:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:transaction(Test)),
 1843:     Clear(), Setup(),
 1844:     ?match(ok, mnesia:sync_dirty(Test)),
 1845:     Clear(), Setup(),
 1846:     ?match(ok, mnesia:activity(transaction,Test,mnesia)),
 1847: 
 1848:     Clear(), Setup(),
 1849:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia(Nodes)),
 1850:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia(Nodes, [Tab1, Tab2])),
 1851:     ?match(ok, Test()),
 1852:     Clear(), Setup(),
 1853:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia(Nodes)),
 1854:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia(Nodes, [Tab1, Tab2])),
 1855:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:transaction(Test)),
 1856: 
 1857:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1858: 
 1859: snmp_get_mnesia_key(suite) -> [];
 1860: snmp_get_mnesia_key(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1861:     [Node1, Node2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 1862:     Tab1 = local_snmp_table,
 1863:     Storage = mnesia_test_lib:storage_type(disc_copies, Config),
 1864:     Def1 = 
 1865: 	case mnesia_test_lib:diskless(Config) of
 1866: 	    true -> [{ram_copies, Nodes}];
 1867: 	    false ->		
 1868: 		[{disc_copies, [Node1]}, {ram_copies, [Node2]}]
 1869: 	end,
 1870: 
 1871:     Tab2 = ext_snmp_table,
 1872:     Def2 = [{Storage, [Node2]}],
 1873: 
 1874:     Tab3 = fix_string,    
 1875:     Setup = fun() -> 
 1876: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab1, Def1)),
 1877: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab2, Def2)),
 1878: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab3, Def1)),
 1879: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:snmp_open_table(Tab1, [{key, integer}])),
 1880: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:snmp_open_table(Tab2, [{key, integer}])),
 1881: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:snmp_open_table(Tab3, [{key, {fix_string,integer}}])),
 1882: 
 1883: 		    add_some_records(Tab1, Tab2, 1)	    
 1884: 	    end,
 1885:     Clear = fun() ->
 1886: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:delete_table(Tab1)),
 1887: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:delete_table(Tab2)),
 1888: 		    ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:delete_table(Tab3))
 1889: 	    end,
 1890:     Test = 
 1891: 	fun() ->
 1892: 		%% Test local tables
 1893: 		{success, Res11} = 
 1894: 		    ?match({ok, [1]}, mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(Tab1,[])),
 1895: 		{ok, Index11} = Res11,
 1896: 		?match({ok, 1}, mnesia:snmp_get_mnesia_key(Tab1, Index11)),    
 1897: 		%% Test external tables
 1898: 		{success, Res21} =
 1899: 		    ?match({ok, [20]}, mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(Tab2, [])),
 1900: 		{ok, Index21} = Res21,
 1901: 		?match({ok, 20}, mnesia:snmp_get_mnesia_key(Tab2, Index21)),
 1902: 		?match(undefined, mnesia:snmp_get_mnesia_key(Tab2, [97])),
 1903: 		?match({'EXIT', _}, mnesia:snmp_get_mnesia_key(Tab2, 97)),
 1904: 
 1905: 		?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:delete({Tab1,1}) end)),
 1906: 		?match(undefined, mnesia:snmp_get_mnesia_key(Tab1, Index11)),
 1907: 		
 1908: 		?match({atomic,ok},mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write({Tab1,73,7}) end)),
 1909: 		?match({ok, 73}, mnesia:snmp_get_mnesia_key(Tab1, [73])),
 1910: 		?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:delete({Tab1,73}) end)),
 1911: 		?match(undefined, mnesia:snmp_get_mnesia_key(Tab1, [73])),
 1912: 
 1913: 		?match({atomic,ok},mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write({Tab3,{"S",5},7}) end)),
 1914: 		?match({ok,{"S",5}}, mnesia:snmp_get_mnesia_key(Tab3, [$S,5])),
 1915: 		?match({atomic,ok},mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:delete({Tab3,{"S",5}}) end)),
 1916: 		?match(undefined, mnesia:snmp_get_mnesia_key(Tab3, [$S,5])),
 1917: 
 1918: 		ok
 1919: 	end,
 1920:     Setup(),
 1921:     ?match(ok, Test()),
 1922:     Clear(), Setup(),
 1923:     ?match({atomic,ok}, mnesia:transaction(Test)),
 1924:     Clear(), Setup(),
 1925:     ?match(ok, mnesia:sync_dirty(Test)),
 1926:     Clear(), Setup(),
 1927:     ?match(ok, mnesia:activity(transaction,Test,mnesia)),
 1928:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1929: 
 1930: snmp_update_counter(doc) ->
 1931:     ["Verify that counters may be updated for tables with SNMP property"];
 1932: snmp_update_counter(suite) -> [];
 1933: snmp_update_counter(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1934:     [Node1] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
 1935:     Tab = snmp_update_counter,
 1936:     Def = [{attributes, [key, value]},
 1937:            {snmp, [{key, integer}]},
 1938:            {ram_copies, [Node1]}
 1939:           ],
 1940:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, Def)),
 1941:     Oid = {Tab, 1},
 1942:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_read(Oid)),
 1943:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 1, 1})),
 1944:     ?match([{Tab, _Key, 1}], mnesia:dirty_read(Oid)),
 1945:     ?match(3, mnesia:dirty_update_counter(Oid, 2)),
 1946:     ?match([{Tab, _Key, 3}], mnesia:dirty_read(Oid)),
 1947:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 1948: 
 1949: snmp_order(doc) ->
 1950:     ["Verify that sort order is correct in transactions and dirty variants"];
 1951: snmp_order(suite) -> [];
 1952: snmp_order(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1953:     [Node1] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
 1954:     Tab = snmp_order,
 1955:     Def = [{attributes, [key, value]},
 1956:            {snmp, [{key, {integer, integer, integer}}]},
 1957:            {ram_copies, [Node1]}
 1958:           ],
 1959:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, Def)),
 1960:     Oid = {Tab, 1},
 1961:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_read(Oid)),
 1962:     ?match({'EXIT', {aborted, _}}, mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, 1, 1})),
 1963:     [mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, {A,B,2}, default}) ||
 1964: 	A <- lists:seq(1, 9, 2),
 1965: 	B <- lists:seq(2, 8, 2)],
 1966:     
 1967:     Test1 = fun() ->
 1968: 		    Keys0 = get_keys(Tab, []),
 1969: 		    ?match(Keys0, lists:sort(Keys0)),
 1970: 		    ?match([[1,2,2]|_], Keys0),
 1971: 		    Keys1 = get_keys(Tab, [5]),
 1972: 		    ?match(Keys1, lists:sort(Keys1)),
 1973: 		    ?match([[5,2,2]|_], Keys1),
 1974: 		    Keys2 = get_keys(Tab, [7, 4]),
 1975: 		    ?match(Keys2, lists:sort(Keys2)),
 1976: 		    ?match([[7,4,2]|_], Keys2),
 1977: 		    ok
 1978: 	    end,
 1979:     ?match(ok, Test1()),
 1980:     ?match({atomic, ok},mnesia:transaction(Test1)),
 1981:     ?match(ok,mnesia:sync_dirty(Test1)),
 1982:    
 1983:     Test2 = fun() ->
 1984: 		    mnesia:write(Tab, {Tab,{0,0,2},updated}, write),
 1985: 		    mnesia:write(Tab, {Tab,{5,3,2},updated}, write),
 1986: 		    mnesia:write(Tab, {Tab,{10,10,2},updated}, write),
 1987: 		    Keys0 = get_keys(Tab, []),
 1988: 		    ?match([[0,0,2],[1,2,2]|_], Keys0),
 1989: 		    ?match(Keys0, lists:sort(Keys0)),
 1990: 		    
 1991: 		    Keys1 = get_keys(Tab, [5]),
 1992: 		    ?match([[5,2,2],[5,3,2]|_], Keys1),
 1993: 		    ?match(Keys1, lists:sort(Keys1)),
 1994: 		    
 1995: 		    Keys2 = get_keys(Tab, [7,4]),
 1996: 		    ?match([[7,4,2]|_], Keys2),
 1997: 		    ?match(Keys2, lists:sort(Keys2)),
 1998: 		    ?match([10,10,2], lists:last(Keys0)),
 1999: 		    ?match([10,10,2], lists:last(Keys1)),
 2000: 		    ?match([10,10,2], lists:last(Keys2)),
 2001: 		    
 2002: 		    ?match([[10,10,2]], get_keys(Tab, [10])),
 2003: 		    ok
 2004: 	    end,
 2005: 
 2006:     ?match({atomic, ok},mnesia:transaction(Test2)),
 2007: 
 2008:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 2009: 
 2010: get_keys(Tab, Key) ->
 2011:     case mnesia:snmp_get_next_index(Tab, Key) of
 2012: 	endOfTable -> [];
 2013: 	{ok, Next} ->
 2014: 	    [Next|get_keys(Tab, Next)]
 2015:     end.
 2016: 
 2017: 
 2018: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 2019: 
 2020: -record(tab, {i, e1, e2}).			% Simple test table
 2021: 
 2022: 
 2023: subscribe_extended(doc) ->
 2024:     ["Test the extended set of events, test with and without checkpoints. "];
 2025: subscribe_extended(suite) ->
 2026:     [];
 2027: subscribe_extended(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2028:     [N1, N2]=Nodes=?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 2029:     Tab1 = etab,
 2030:     Storage = mnesia_test_lib:storage_type(ram_copies, Config),
 2031:     Def1 = [{Storage, [N1, N2]}, {attributes, record_info(fields, tab)}],
 2032:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab1, Def1)),
 2033: 
 2034:     Tab2 = bag,
 2035:     Def2 = [{Storage, [N1, N2]}, 
 2036: 	    {type, bag},
 2037: 	    {record_name, Tab1},
 2038: 	    {attributes, record_info(fields, tab)}],
 2039:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab2, Def2)),
 2040: 
 2041:     Tab3 = ctab,
 2042:     Def3 = [{Storage, [N1, N2]}],
 2043:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab3, Def3)),
 2044: 
 2045:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:subscribe({table, Tab1, detailed})),
 2046:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:subscribe({table, Tab2, detailed})),
 2047:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:subscribe({table, Tab3, detailed})),
 2048: 
 2049:     ?match({error, {already_exists, _}}, mnesia:subscribe({table, Tab1, simple})),
 2050:     ?match({error, {badarg, {table, Tab1, bad}}}, mnesia:subscribe({table, Tab1, bad})),
 2051: 
 2052:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:subscribe(activity)),
 2053:     test_ext_sub(Tab1, Tab2, Tab3),
 2054:     
 2055:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:unsubscribe(activity)),
 2056:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:subscribe({table, Tab1, detailed})),
 2057:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:clear_table(Tab1)),
 2058:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {delete, schema, {schema, Tab1}, [{schema, Tab1, _}],_}}, recv_event()),
 2059:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, schema, {schema, Tab1, _}, [], _}}, recv_event()),
 2060: 
 2061:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:clear_table(Tab2)),
 2062:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {delete, schema, {schema, Tab2}, [{schema, Tab2, _}],_}}, 
 2063: 	   recv_event()),
 2064:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, schema, {schema, Tab2, _}, [], _}}, recv_event()),
 2065: 
 2066:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:unsubscribe({table, Tab2, detailed})),    
 2067:     {ok, _, _} = mnesia:activate_checkpoint([{name, testing}, 
 2068: 					     {ram_overrides_dump, true}, 
 2069: 					     {max, [Tab1, Tab2]}]),
 2070:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:subscribe({table, Tab2, detailed})),
 2071:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:subscribe(activity)),
 2072:     test_ext_sub(Tab1, Tab2, Tab3),
 2073: 
 2074:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 2075: 
 2076: test_ext_sub(Tab1, Tab2, Tab3) ->
 2077:     %% The basics 
 2078:     Rec1 = {Tab1, 1, 0, 0},
 2079:     Rec2 = {Tab1, 1, 1, 0},
 2080:     Rec3 = {Tab1, 2, 1, 0},
 2081:     Rec4 = {Tab1, 2, 2, 0},
 2082: 
 2083:     Write  = fun(Tab, Rec) -> 
 2084: 		     mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(Tab, Rec, write) 
 2085: 					end) 
 2086: 	     end,
 2087:     Delete = fun(Tab, Rec) -> 
 2088: 		     mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:delete(Tab, Rec, write) 
 2089: 					end) 
 2090: 	     end,
 2091:     DelObj = fun(Tab, Rec) -> 
 2092: 		     mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:delete_object(Tab, Rec, write) 
 2093: 					end) 
 2094: 	     end,
 2095: 
 2096:     S = self(),
 2097:     D = {dirty, self()},
 2098:     %% SET 
 2099:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(Rec1)),
 2100:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, Tab1, Rec1, [], D}}, recv_event()), 
 2101:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(Rec3)),
 2102:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, Tab1, Rec3, [], D}}, recv_event()),    
 2103:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(Rec1)),
 2104:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, Tab1, Rec1, [Rec1], D}}, recv_event()),
 2105:     ?match({atomic, ok}, Write(Tab1, Rec2)),
 2106:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, Tab1, Rec2, [Rec1], {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),    
 2107:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, {complete, {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2108:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_delete({Tab1, 2})),
 2109:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {delete, Tab1, {Tab1, 2}, [Rec3], D}}, recv_event()),
 2110:     ?match({atomic, ok}, DelObj(Tab1, Rec2)),
 2111:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {delete, Tab1, Rec2, [Rec2], {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2112:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, {complete, {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2113: 
 2114:     ?match({atomic, ok}, Delete(Tab1, 1)),
 2115:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {delete, Tab1, {Tab1, 1}, [], {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2116:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, {complete, {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2117:     ?match({ok, _N1}, mnesia:unsubscribe({table, Tab1, detailed})),
 2118: 
 2119:     %% BAG 
 2120: 
 2121:     ?match({atomic, ok}, Write(Tab2, Rec1)),
 2122:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, Tab2, Rec1, [], {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2123:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, {complete, {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2124:     ?match({atomic, ok}, Write(Tab2, Rec4)),
 2125:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, Tab2, Rec4, [], {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),    
 2126:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, {complete, {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2127:     ?match({atomic, ok}, Write(Tab2, Rec3)),
 2128:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, Tab2, Rec3, [Rec4], {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),    
 2129:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, {complete, {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2130:     ?match({atomic, ok}, Write(Tab2, Rec2)),
 2131:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, Tab2, Rec2, [Rec1], {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),    
 2132:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, {complete, {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2133:     ?match({atomic, ok}, Write(Tab2, Rec1)),
 2134:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, Tab2, Rec1, [Rec1, Rec2], {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2135:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, {complete, {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2136:     ?match({atomic, ok}, DelObj(Tab2, Rec2)),
 2137:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {delete, Tab2, Rec2, [Rec2], {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2138:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, {complete, {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2139:     ?match({atomic, ok}, Delete(Tab2, 1)),
 2140:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {delete, Tab2, {Tab2, 1}, [Rec1], {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2141:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, {complete, {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2142:     ?match({atomic, ok}, Delete(Tab2, 2)),
 2143:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {delete, Tab2, {Tab2, 2}, [Rec4, Rec3], {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2144:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, {complete, {tid,_,S}}}, recv_event()),
 2145: 
 2146:     %% COUNTERS
 2147: 
 2148:     Rec5 = {Tab3, counter, 0},
 2149:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(Rec5)),
 2150:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, Tab3, Rec5, [], D}}, recv_event()),
 2151:     ?match(1, mnesia:dirty_update_counter({Tab3, counter}, 1)),
 2152:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, Tab3, {Tab3,counter,1}, [Rec5], D}}, recv_event()),
 2153:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_delete({Tab3, counter})),
 2154:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {delete, Tab3, {Tab3,counter},
 2155: 				 [{Tab3,counter,1}], D}}, recv_event()),
 2156:     ok.
 2157:
