 2159: subscribe_standard(doc) ->
 2160:     ["Tests system events and the original table events"];
 2161: subscribe_standard(suite) -> [];
 2162: subscribe_standard(Config) when is_list(Config)-> 
 2163:     [N1, N2]=?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 2164:     Tab = tab,
 2165: 
 2166:     Storage = mnesia_test_lib:storage_type(disc_copies, Config),
 2167:     Def = [{Storage, [N1, N2]}, {attributes, record_info(fields, tab)}],
 2168: 
 2169:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, Def)),
 2170: 
 2171:     %% Check system events
 2172:     ?match({error, {badarg, foo}}, mnesia:unsubscribe(foo)),
 2173:     ?match({error, badarg}, mnesia:unsubscribe({table, foo})),
 2174:     mnesia:unsubscribe(activity),
 2175: 
 2176:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:subscribe(system)),
 2177:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:subscribe(activity)),
 2178: 
 2179:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([N2])),
 2180:     ?match({mnesia_system_event, {mnesia_down, N2}}, recv_event()),
 2181:     ?match(timeout, recv_event()),
 2182: 
 2183:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([N2], [Tab])),
 2184:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, _}, recv_event()),
 2185:     ?match({mnesia_system_event,{mnesia_up, N2}}, recv_event()),
 2186: 
 2187:     ?match(true, lists:member(self(), mnesia:system_info(subscribers))),
 2188:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([N1])),
 2189:     timer:sleep(500),
 2190:     mnesia_test_lib:flush(),
 2191:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([N1], [Tab])),
 2192:     ?match(timeout, recv_event()),
 2193: 
 2194:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:subscribe(system)),
 2195:     ?match({error, {already_exists, system}}, mnesia:subscribe(system)),
 2196:     ?match(stopped, mnesia:stop()),
 2197:     ?match({mnesia_system_event, {mnesia_down, N1}}, recv_event()),
 2198:     ?match({error, {node_not_running, N1}}, mnesia:subscribe(system)),
 2199:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia([N1, N2], [Tab])),
 2200: 
 2201:     %% Check table events
 2202:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:subscribe(activity)),
 2203:     Old_Level = mnesia:set_debug_level(trace),
 2204:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:subscribe({table,Tab})),
 2205: 
 2206:     ?match({atomic, ok},
 2207: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(#tab{i=155}) end)),
 2208:     Self = self(),
 2209:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, _, _}}, recv_event()),
 2210:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, {complete, {tid, _, Self}}}, recv_event()),
 2211: 
 2212:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:unsubscribe({table,Tab})),
 2213:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:unsubscribe(activity)),
 2214: 
 2215:     ?match({atomic, ok},
 2216: 	   mnesia:transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(#tab{i=255}) end)),
 2217:     
 2218:     ?match(timeout, recv_event()),
 2219:     mnesia:set_debug_level(Old_Level),
 2220: 
 2221:     %% Check deletion of replica
 2222: 
 2223:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:subscribe({table,Tab})),
 2224:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:subscribe(activity)),
 2225:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(#tab{i=355})),
 2226:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, _, _}}, recv_event()),
 2227:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:del_table_copy(Tab, N1)),
 2228:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, _}, recv_event()),
 2229:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(#tab{i=455})),
 2230:     ?match(timeout, recv_event()),
 2231: 
 2232:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:move_table_copy(Tab, N2, N1)),
 2233:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, _}, recv_event()),
 2234:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:subscribe({table,Tab})),
 2235:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(#tab{i=555})),
 2236:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, _, _}}, recv_event()),
 2237:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:move_table_copy(Tab, N1, N2)),
 2238:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, _}, recv_event()),
 2239:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(#tab{i=655})),
 2240:     ?match(timeout, recv_event()),
 2241: 
 2242:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:add_table_copy(Tab, N1, ram_copies)),
 2243:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, _}, recv_event()),
 2244:     ?match({ok, N1}, mnesia:subscribe({table,Tab})),
 2245:     ?match({error, {already_exists, {table,Tab, simple}}}, 
 2246: 	   mnesia:subscribe({table,Tab})),
 2247:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(#tab{i=755})),
 2248:     ?match({mnesia_table_event, {write, _, _}}, recv_event()),
 2249: 
 2250:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:delete_table(Tab)),
 2251:     ?match({mnesia_activity_event, _}, recv_event()),
 2252:     ?match(timeout, recv_event()),
 2253: 
 2254:     mnesia_test_lib:kill_mnesia([N1]),
 2255: 
 2256:     ?verify_mnesia([N2], [N1]).
 2257: 
 2258: recv_event() ->
 2259:     receive
 2260: 	Event -> Event
 2261:     after 1000 -> 
 2262: 	    timeout
 2263:     end.
 2264:

 2267: 
 2268: foldl(suite) ->
 2269:     [];
 2270: foldl(doc) ->
 2271:     [""];
 2272: foldl(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2273:     Nodes = [_N1, N2] = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 2274:     Tab1 = fold_local,
 2275:     Tab2 = fold_remote,
 2276:     Tab3 = fold_ordered, 
 2277:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab1, [{ram_copies, Nodes}])),
 2278:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab2, [{ram_copies, [N2]}, {type, bag}])),
 2279:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab3, [{ram_copies, Nodes}, 
 2280: 						    {type, ordered_set}])),    
 2281: 
 2282:     Tab1Els = [{Tab1, N, N} || N <- lists:seq(1, 10)],
 2283:     Tab2Els = ?sort([{Tab2, 1, 2} | [{Tab2, N, N} || N <- lists:seq(1, 10)]]),
 2284:     Tab3Els = [{Tab3, N, N} || N <- lists:seq(1, 10)],
 2285: 
 2286:     [mnesia:sync_transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(E) end) || E <- Tab1Els],
 2287:     [mnesia:sync_transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(E) end) || E <- Tab2Els],
 2288:     [mnesia:sync_transaction(fun() -> mnesia:write(E) end) || E <- Tab3Els],
 2289: 
 2290:     Fold = fun(Tab) ->
 2291: 		   lists:reverse(mnesia:foldl(fun(E, A) -> [E | A] end, [], Tab))
 2292: 	   end,
 2293:     Fold2 = fun(Tab, Lock) ->
 2294: 		    lists:reverse(mnesia:foldl(fun(E, A) -> [E | A] end, [], Tab, Lock))
 2295: 	    end,    
 2296:     Exit = fun(Tab) ->
 2297: 		   lists:reverse(mnesia:foldl(fun(_E, _A) -> exit(testing) end, [], Tab))
 2298: 	   end,
 2299:     %% Errors 
 2300:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:transaction(Fold, [error])),
 2301:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:transaction(fun(Tab) -> mnesia:foldl(badfun,[],Tab) end,
 2302: 					    [Tab1])),    
 2303:     ?match({aborted, testing}, mnesia:transaction(Exit, [Tab1])), 
 2304:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:transaction(Fold2, [Tab1, read_lock])),
 2305: 
 2306:     %% Success
 2307:     ?match({atomic, Tab1Els}, sort_res(mnesia:transaction(Fold, [Tab1]))),
 2308:     ?match({atomic, Tab2Els}, sort_res(mnesia:transaction(Fold, [Tab2]))),
 2309:     ?match({atomic, Tab3Els}, mnesia:transaction(Fold, [Tab3])),        
 2310: 
 2311:     ?match({atomic, Tab1Els}, sort_res(mnesia:transaction(Fold2, [Tab1, read]))),
 2312:     ?match({atomic, Tab1Els}, sort_res(mnesia:transaction(Fold2, [Tab1, write]))),
 2313: 
 2314:     ?match(Tab1Els, sort_res(mnesia:sync_dirty(Fold, [Tab1]))),
 2315:     ?match(Tab2Els, sort_res(mnesia:async_dirty(Fold, [Tab2]))),
 2316: 
 2317:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).	   
 2318: 
 2319: sort_res({atomic, List}) ->
 2320:     {atomic, ?sort(List)};
 2321: sort_res(Else) when is_list(Else) ->
 2322:     ?sort(Else);
 2323: sort_res(Else) ->
 2324:     Else.
 2325:

 2331:     ?match(ok, mnesia:info()),
 2332:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).

 2348: view_0(suite) -> [];

 2351:     ?match(ok, mnesia_lib:view()),

 2353: 
 2354: view_1(suite) -> [];
 2355: view_1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2356:     Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
 2357:     BinCore = mnesia_lib:mkcore({crashinfo, "Just testing..."}),
 2358:     CoreFile = lists:concat(["MnesiaCore.", node(), ".view_1.", ?MODULE]),
 2359:     ?match(ok, file:write_file(CoreFile, BinCore)),
 2360:     ?match(ok, mnesia_lib:view(CoreFile)),
 2361:     ?match(ok, file:delete(CoreFile)),
 2362: 
 2363:     ?match(stopped, mnesia:stop()),
 2364:     Dir = mnesia:system_info(directory),
 2365:     ?match(eof, mnesia_lib:view(filename:join(Dir, "LATEST.LOG"))),
 2366:     ?match(ok, mnesia_lib:view(filename:join(Dir, "schema.DAT"))),
 2367:     ?verify_mnesia([], Nodes).
 2368: 
 2369: view_2(suite) -> [];
 2370: view_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2371:     Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
 2372:     BinCore = mnesia_lib:mkcore({crashinfo, "More testing..."}),
 2373:     File = lists:concat([?MODULE, "view_2.", node()]),
 2374:     ?match(ok, file:write_file(File, BinCore)),
 2375:     ?match(ok, mnesia_lib:view(File, core)),
 2376:     ?match(ok, file:delete(File)),
 2377: 
 2378:     ?match(stopped, mnesia:stop()),
 2379:     Dir = mnesia:system_info(directory),
 2380:     ?match(ok, file:rename(filename:join(Dir, "LATEST.LOG"), File)),
 2381:     ?match(eof, mnesia_lib:view(File, log)),
 2382:     ?match(ok, file:delete(File)),
 2383: 
 2384:     ?match(ok, file:rename(filename:join(Dir, "schema.DAT"), File)),
 2385:     ?match(ok, mnesia_lib:view(File, dat)),
 2386:     ?match(ok, file:delete(File)),
 2387:     ?verify_mnesia([], Nodes).
 2388: 
 2389: lkill(suite) -> [];
 2390: lkill(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2391:     [Node1, Node2] = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 2392: 
 2393:     ?match(yes, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, system_info, [is_running])),
 2394:     ?match(yes, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, system_info, [is_running])),
 2395:     ?match(ok, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, lkill, [])),
 2396:     ?match(yes, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, system_info, [is_running])),
 2397:     ?match(no, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, system_info, [is_running])),
 2398:     ?verify_mnesia([Node1], [Node2]).
 2399: 
 2400: kill(suite) -> [];
 2401: kill(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2402:     [Node1, Node2] = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 2403: 
 2404:     ?match(yes, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, system_info, [is_running])),
 2405:     ?match(yes, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, system_info, [is_running])),
 2406:     ?match({_, []}, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, kill, [])),
 2407:     ?match(no, rpc:call(Node1, mnesia, system_info, [is_running])),
 2408:     ?match(no, rpc:call(Node2, mnesia, system_info, [is_running])),
 2409:     ?verify_mnesia([], [Node1, Node2]).
 2410:

 2420: record_name_dirty_access_disc(suite) ->
 2421:     [];
 2422: record_name_dirty_access_disc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2423:     record_name_dirty_access(disc_copies, Config).
 2424: 
 2425: record_name_dirty_access_disc_only(suite) ->
 2426:     [];
 2427: record_name_dirty_access_disc_only(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2428:     record_name_dirty_access(disc_only_copies, Config).
 2429: 
 2430: record_name_dirty_access_xets(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2431:     record_name_dirty_access(ext_ram_copies, Config).
 2432: 
 2433: 
 2434: record_name_dirty_access(Storage, Config) ->
 2435:     [Node1, _Node2] = Nodes = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 2436: 
 2437:     List = lists:concat([record_name_dirty_access_, Storage]),
 2438:     Tab = list_to_atom(List),
 2439:     RecName = some_record,
 2440:     Attr = val,
 2441:     TabDef = [{type, bag},
 2442: 	      {record_name, RecName},
 2443: 	      {index, [Attr]},
 2444: 	      {Storage, Nodes}],
 2445:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Tab, TabDef)),
 2446: 
 2447:     ?match(RecName, mnesia:table_info(Tab, record_name)),
 2448: 
 2449:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(Tab, {RecName, 2, 20})),
 2450:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(Tab, {RecName, 2, 21})),
 2451:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(Tab, {RecName, 2, 22})),
 2452: 
 2453:     %% Backup test
 2454:     BupFile = List ++ ".BUP",
 2455:     CpName = cpname,
 2456:     CpArgs = [{name, CpName}, {min, [Tab]}, {ram_overrides_dump, true}],
 2457:     ?match({ok, CpName, _}, mnesia:activate_checkpoint(CpArgs)),
 2458:     ?match(ok, mnesia:backup_checkpoint(CpName, BupFile)),
 2459:     ?match(ok, mnesia:deactivate_checkpoint(CpName)),
 2460: 
 2461:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(Tab, {RecName, 1, 10})),
 2462:     ?match({ok, Node1}, mnesia:subscribe({table, Tab})),
 2463:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_write(Tab, {RecName, 3, 10})),
 2464: 
 2465:     Twos =?sort( [{RecName, 2, 20}, {RecName, 2, 21}, {RecName, 2, 22}]),
 2466:     ?match(Twos, ?sort(mnesia:dirty_read(Tab, 2))),
 2467: 
 2468:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_delete_object(Tab, {RecName, 2, 21})),
 2469: 
 2470:     Tens = ?sort([{RecName, 1, 10}, {RecName, 3, 10}]),
 2471:     TenPat = {RecName, '_', 10},
 2472:     ?match(Tens, ?sort(mnesia:dirty_match_object(Tab, TenPat))),
 2473:     ?match(Tens, ?sort(mnesia:dirty_select(Tab, [{TenPat, [], ['$_']}]))),
 2474: 
 2475:     %% Subscription test
 2476:     E = mnesia_table_event,
 2477:     ?match_receive({E, {write, {Tab, 3, 10}, _}}),
 2478:     ?match_receive({E, {delete_object, {Tab, 2, 21}, _}}),
 2479:     ?match({ok, Node1}, mnesia:unsubscribe({table, Tab})),
 2480: 
 2481:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia([Node1])),
 2482:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia(Nodes, [Tab])),
 2483: 
 2484:     ?match(Tens, ?sort(mnesia:dirty_index_match_object(Tab, TenPat, Attr) )),
 2485:     ?match(Tens, ?sort(mnesia:dirty_index_read(Tab, 10, Attr))),
 2486: 
 2487:     ?match([1, 2, 3], ?sort(mnesia:dirty_all_keys(Tab))),
 2488: 
 2489:     ?match({ok, Node1}, mnesia:subscribe({table, Tab})),
 2490:     ?match(ok, mnesia:dirty_delete(Tab, 2)),
 2491:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_read(Tab, 2)),
 2492: 
 2493:     ?match_receive({E, {delete, {Tab, 2}, _}}),
 2494:     ?match([], mnesia_test_lib:flush()),
 2495:     ?match({ok, Node1}, mnesia:unsubscribe({table, Tab})),
 2496: 
 2497:     %% Restore test
 2498:     ?match({atomic, [Tab]}, mnesia:restore(BupFile, [{recreate_tables, [Tab]}])),
 2499:     ?match(RecName, mnesia:table_info(Tab, record_name)),
 2500: 
 2501:     ?match(Twos, ?sort(mnesia:dirty_match_object(Tab, mnesia:table_info(Tab, wild_pattern)))),
 2502:     ?match(Twos, ?sort(mnesia:dirty_select(Tab, 
 2503: 					   [{mnesia:table_info(Tab, wild_pattern),
 2504: 					     [],['$_']}]))),
 2505: 
 2506:     %% Traverse backup test
 2507: 
 2508:     Fun = fun(Rec, {Good, Bad}) ->
 2509: 		  ?verbose("BUP: ~p~n", [Rec]),
 2510: 		  case Rec of
 2511: 		      {T, K, V} when T == Tab ->
 2512: 			  Good2 = Good ++ [{RecName, K, V}],
 2513: 			  {[Rec], {?sort(Good2), Bad}};
 2514: 		      {T, K} when T == Tab ->
 2515: 			  Good2 = [G || G <- Good, element(2, G) /= K],
 2516: 			  {[Rec], {?sort(Good2), Bad}};
 2517: 		      _ when element(1, Rec) == schema ->
 2518: 			  {[Rec], {Good, Bad}};
 2519: 		      _ ->
 2520: 			  Bad2 = Bad ++ [Rec],
 2521: 			  {[Rec], {Good, ?sort(Bad2)}}
 2522: 		  end
 2523:           end,
 2524: 
 2525:     ?match({ok, {Twos, []}}, mnesia:traverse_backup(BupFile, mnesia_backup, 
 2526: 						    dummy, read_only, 
 2527: 						    Fun, {[], []})),
 2528:     ?match(ok, file:delete(BupFile)),
 2529: 
 2530:     %% Update counter test
 2531: 
 2532:     CounterTab = list_to_atom(lists:concat([Tab, "_counter"])),
 2533:     CounterTabDef = [{record_name, some_counter}],
 2534:     C = my_counter,
 2535:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(CounterTab, CounterTabDef)),
 2536:     ?match(some_counter, mnesia:table_info(CounterTab, record_name)),
 2537:     ?match(0, mnesia:dirty_update_counter(CounterTab, gurka, -10)),
 2538:     ?match(10, mnesia:dirty_update_counter(CounterTab, C, 10)),
 2539:     ?match(11, mnesia:dirty_update_counter(CounterTab, C, 1)),
 2540:     ?match(4711, mnesia:dirty_update_counter(CounterTab, C, 4700)),
 2541:     ?match([{some_counter, C, 4711}], mnesia:dirty_read(CounterTab, C)),
 2542:     ?match(0, mnesia:dirty_update_counter(CounterTab, C, -4747)),
 2543: 
 2544:     %% Registry tests
 2545: 
 2546:     RegTab = list_to_atom(lists:concat([Tab, "_registry"])),
 2547:     RegTabDef = [{record_name, some_reg}],
 2548:     ?match(ok, mnesia_registry:create_table(RegTab, RegTabDef)),
 2549:     ?match(some_reg, mnesia:table_info(RegTab, record_name)),
 2550:     {success, RegRecs} =
 2551: 	?match([_ | _], mnesia_registry_test:dump_registry(node(), RegTab)),
 2552: 
 2553:     R = ?sort(RegRecs),
 2554:     ?match(R, ?sort(mnesia_registry_test:restore_registry(node(), RegTab))),
 2555: 
 2556:     ?verify_mnesia(Nodes, []).
 2557: 
 2558: sorted_ets(suite) ->
 2559:     [];
 2560: sorted_ets(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2561:     [N1, N2, N3] = All = ?acquire_nodes(3, Config),
 2562: 
 2563:     Tab = sorted_tab,    
 2564:     Def = case  mnesia_test_lib:diskless(Config) of
 2565: 	      true ->  [{name, Tab}, {type, ordered_set}, {ram_copies, All}];
 2566: 	      false -> [{name, Tab}, {type, ordered_set},
 2567: 			{ram_copies, [N1]}, 
 2568: 			{disc_copies,[N2, N3]}]
 2569: 	  end,
 2570: 
 2571:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(Def)),
 2572:     ?match({aborted, _}, mnesia:create_table(fel, [{disc_only_copies, N1}])),
 2573: 
 2574:     ?match([ok | _], 
 2575: 	   [mnesia:dirty_write({Tab, {dirty, N}, N}) || N <- lists:seq(1, 10)]),    
 2576:     ?match({atomic, _}, 
 2577: 	   mnesia:sync_transaction(fun() ->
 2578: 					   [mnesia:write({Tab, {trans, N}, N}) || 
 2579: 					       N <- lists:seq(1, 10)]
 2580: 				   end)),
 2581: 
 2582:     List = mnesia:dirty_match_object({Tab, '_', '_'}),
 2583:     ?match(List, ?sort(List)),
 2584:     ?match(List, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, dirty_match_object, [{Tab, '_', '_'}])),
 2585:     ?match(List, rpc:call(N3, mnesia, dirty_match_object, [{Tab, '_', '_'}])),
 2586: 
 2587:     mnesia_test_lib:stop_mnesia(All),
 2588:     mnesia_test_lib:start_mnesia(All, [sorted_tab]),
 2589: 
 2590:     List = mnesia:dirty_match_object({Tab, '_', '_'}),
 2591:     ?match(List, ?sort(List)),
 2592:     ?match(List, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, dirty_match_object, [{Tab, '_', '_'}])),
 2593:     ?match(List, rpc:call(N3, mnesia, dirty_match_object, [{Tab, '_', '_'}])),
 2594: 
 2595:     ?match(List, rpc:call(N3, mnesia, dirty_select, [Tab, [{{Tab, '_', '_'},[],['$_']}]])),
 2596: 
 2597:     TransMatch = fun() ->
 2598: 			 mnesia:write({Tab, {trans, 0}, 0}),
 2599: 			 mnesia:write({Tab, {trans, 11}, 11}),
 2600: 			 mnesia:match_object({Tab, '_', '_'})
 2601: 		 end,
 2602:     TransSelect = fun() ->
 2603: 			  mnesia:write({Tab, {trans, 0}, 0}),
 2604: 			  mnesia:write({Tab, {trans, 11}, 11}),
 2605: 			  mnesia:select(Tab, [{{Tab, '_', '_'},[],['$_']}])
 2606: 		  end,
 2607: 
 2608:     TList = mnesia:transaction(TransMatch),
 2609:     STList = ?sort(TList),
 2610:     ?match(STList, TList),
 2611:     ?match(STList, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, transaction, [TransMatch])),
 2612:     ?match(STList, rpc:call(N3, mnesia, transaction, [TransMatch])),
 2613: 
 2614:     TSel = mnesia:transaction(TransSelect),
 2615:     ?match(STList, TSel),
 2616:     ?match(STList, rpc:call(N2, mnesia, transaction, [TransSelect])),
 2617:     ?match(STList, rpc:call(N3, mnesia, transaction, [TransSelect])),
 2618: 
 2619:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(rec, [{type, ordered_set}])),
 2620:     [ok = mnesia:dirty_write(R) || R <- [{rec,1,1}, {rec,2,1}]],
 2621:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:add_table_index(rec, 3)),    
 2622:     TestIt = fun() ->
 2623: 		     ok = mnesia:write({rec,1,1}),
 2624: 		     mnesia:index_read(rec, 1, 3)
 2625: 	     end,
 2626:     ?match({atomic, [{rec,1,1}, {rec,2,1}]}, mnesia:transaction(TestIt)).
 2627: 
 2628: 
 2629: index_cleanup(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2630:     [N1, N2] = All = ?acquire_nodes(2, Config),
 2631:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(i_set, [{type, set}, {ram_copies, [N1]}, {index, [val]},
 2632:                                                      {disc_only_copies, [N2]}])),
 2633:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(i_bag, [{type, bag}, {ram_copies, [N1]}, {index, [val]},
 2634:                                                      {disc_only_copies, [N2]}])),
 2635:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(i_oset, [{type, ordered_set}, {ram_copies, [N1, N2]},
 2636:                                                       {index, [val]}])),
 2637: 
 2638:     Tabs = [i_set, i_bag, i_oset],
 2639: 
 2640:     Add = fun(Tab) ->
 2641:                   Write = fun(Table) ->
 2642:                                   Recs = [{Table, N, N rem 5} || N <- lists:seq(1,10)],
 2643:                                   [ok = mnesia:write(Rec) || Rec <- Recs],
 2644:                                   Recs
 2645:                           end,
 2646:                   {atomic, Recs} = mnesia:sync_transaction(Write, [Tab]),
 2647:                   lists:sort(Recs)
 2648:           end,
 2649: 
 2650:     IRead = fun(Tab) ->
 2651:                     Read = fun(Table) ->
 2652:                                    [mnesia:index_read(Table, N, val) || N <- lists:seq(0,4)]
 2653:                            end,
 2654:                     {atomic, Recs} = mnesia:transaction(Read, [Tab]),
 2655:                     lists:sort(lists:flatten(Recs))
 2656:            end,
 2657: 
 2658:     Delete = fun(Rec) ->
 2659:                      Del = fun() -> mnesia:delete_object(Rec) end,
 2660:                      {atomic, ok} = mnesia:sync_transaction(Del),
 2661:                      ok
 2662:              end,
 2663: 
 2664: 
 2665:     Recs = [Add(Tab) || Tab <- Tabs],
 2666:     ?match(Recs, [IRead(Tab) || Tab <- Tabs]),
 2667:     [Delete(Rec) || Rec <- lists:flatten(Recs)],
 2668: 
 2669:     [?match({Tab,0}, {Tab,mnesia:table_info(Tab, size)}) || Tab <- Tabs],
 2670: 
 2671:     [?match({Tab,Node,0, _}, rpc:call(Node, ?MODULE, index_size, [Tab]))
 2672:      || Node <- All, Tab <- Tabs],
 2673:     ?verify_mnesia(All, []).
 2674: 
 2675: index_size(Tab) ->
 2676:     %% White box testing
 2677:     case mnesia:table_info(Tab, index_info) of
 2678:         {index, _, [{_, {ram, Ref}}=Dbg]} -> {Tab, node(), ets:info(Ref, size), Dbg};
 2679:         {index, _, [{_, {dets, Ref}}=Dbg]} -> {Tab, node(), dets:info(Ref, size), Dbg}
 2680:     end.
